=1n‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚à•‚àëq=0Q‚àí1‚àáfi‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àíQ‚Äã‚àáfi‚Äã(wt)‚à•2absent1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°ùëÑ‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle=\frac{1}{n}\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\left\lVert\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\nabla f_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-Q\nabla f_{i}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2} (46)
=1n‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚à•‚àëq=0Q‚àí1[‚àáfi‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáfi‚Äã(wt)]‚à•2absent1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1delimited-[]‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle=\frac{1}{n}\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\left\lVert\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\left[\nabla f_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla f_{i}(w^{t})\right]\right\rVert^{2} (47)
‚â§Qn‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1‚à•‚àáfi‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáfi‚Äã(wt)‚à•2,absentùëÑùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle{\leq}\frac{Q}{n}\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q=0}^{Q{-}1}\left\lVert\nabla f_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla f_{i}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2}, (48)
Sa4subscriptùëÜsubscriptùëé4\displaystyle S_{a_{4}} =‚àëi=1n‚à•‚àëq=0Q‚àí1‚àá~\displaystyle=\,\,\,\,\,\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\Big{\lVert}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\tilde{\nabla} fi(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚à•2\displaystyle f_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2} (49)
‚â§Q‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1absentùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1\displaystyle{\leq}\,\,\,\,Q\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1} ‚à•‚àá~‚Äãfi‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚à•2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•~‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°2\displaystyle\Big{\lVert}\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2} (50)
=Q‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1ùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1\displaystyle=\,\,\,\,\,\,\,\,Q\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1} ‚à•‚àá~fi(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáfi(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))+‚àáfi(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáfi(wt)\displaystyle\Big{\lVert}\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla f_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)+\nabla f_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla f_{i}\left(w^{t}\right)
+‚àáfi(wt)‚àí‚àáf(wt)+‚àáf(wt)‚à•2\displaystyle+\nabla f_{i}\left(w^{t}\right)-\nabla f\left(w^{t}\right)+\nabla f\left(w^{t}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2} (51)
‚â§4‚ÄãQ‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1absent4ùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1\displaystyle{\leq}4Q\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1} [‚à•‚àá~fi(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáfi(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚à•2+‚à•‚àáfi(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáfi(wt)‚à•2\displaystyle\Bigg{[}\Big{\lVert}\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla f_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}+\Big{\lVert}\nabla f_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla f_{i}\left(w^{t}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}
+‚à•‚àáfi(wt)‚àí‚àáf(wt)‚à•2+‚à•‚àáf(wt)‚à•2]‚áí\displaystyle+\Big{\lVert}\nabla f_{i}\left(w^{t}\right)-\nabla f\left(w^{t}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}+\Big{\lVert}\nabla f\left(w^{t}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}\Bigg{]}\Rightarrow (52)
ùîº‚Äã[Sa4]ùîºdelimited-[]subscriptùëÜsubscriptùëé4\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[S_{a_{4}}] ‚â§4‚ÄãQ‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1ùîºpi‚Äã[‚à•‚àá~‚Äãfi‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáfi‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚à•2]absent4ùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1subscriptùîºsubscriptùëùùëñdelimited-[]superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•~‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°2\displaystyle{\leq}4Q\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\mathbb{E}_{p_{i}}\Bigg{[}\Big{\lVert}\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla f_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}\Bigg{]} (53)
+4‚ÄãQ‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáfi‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáfi‚Äã(wt)‚à•24ùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle+4Q\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla f_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla f_{i}\left(w^{t}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2} (54)
+4‚ÄãQ‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáfi‚Äã(wt)‚àí‚àáf‚Äã(wt)‚à•24ùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptùë§ùë°‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle+4Q\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla f_{i}\left(w^{t}\right)-\nabla f\left(w^{t}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2} (55)
+4‚ÄãQ‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(wt)‚à•24ùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle+4Q\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla f\left(w^{t}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2} (56)
‚â§4‚Äãn‚ÄãQ2‚Äã[œÉa2+Œ≥g2+ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(wt)‚à•2]absent4ùëõsuperscriptùëÑ2delimited-[]superscriptsubscriptùúéùëé2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëî2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle{\leq}4nQ^{2}\left[\sigma_{a}^{2}+\gamma_{g}^{2}+\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla f\left(w^{t}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}\right] (57)
+4‚ÄãQ‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáfi‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáfi‚Äã(wt)‚à•2.4ùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle+4Q\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla f_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla f_{i}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2}. (58)

Therefore, due to (43)-(48) and (57)-(58), we have

ùîº‚Äãf‚Äã(wt+1)ùîºùëìsuperscriptùë§ùë°1\displaystyle\mathbb{E}f\left(w^{t{+}1}\right) ‚â§ùîº‚Äãf‚Äã(wt)‚àí[Œ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚Äã(2‚ÄãQ‚àí1)2‚àí2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãL‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãQ2]‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(wt)‚à•2absentùîºùëìsuperscriptùë§ùë°delimited-[]ùúÇùõΩ2ùëÑ122superscriptùúÇ2ùêøsuperscriptùõΩ2superscriptùëÑ2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}f(w^{t})-\left[\frac{\eta\beta(2Q{-}1)}{2}-2\eta^{2}L\beta^{2}Q^{2}\right]\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla f(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2} (59)
+[Œ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãQ2‚Äãn+2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãQ‚ÄãLn]‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáfi‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáfi‚Äã(wt)‚à•2delimited-[]ùúÇùõΩùëÑ2ùëõ2superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùõΩ2ùëÑùêøùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle+\left[\frac{\eta\beta Q}{2n}+\frac{2\eta^{2}\beta^{2}QL}{n}\right]\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla f_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla f_{i}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2} (60)
+2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãL‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãQ2‚ÄãœÉa2+2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãL‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãQ2‚ÄãŒ≥g22superscriptùúÇ2ùêøsuperscriptùõΩ2superscriptùëÑ2superscriptsubscriptùúéùëé22superscriptùúÇ2ùêøsuperscriptùõΩ2superscriptùëÑ2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëî2\displaystyle+2\eta^{2}L\beta^{2}Q^{2}\sigma_{a}^{2}+2\eta^{2}L\beta^{2}Q^{2}\gamma_{g}^{2} (61)
‚â§ùîº‚Äãf‚Äã(wt)‚àí[Œ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚Äã(2‚ÄãQ‚àí1)2‚àí2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãL‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãQ2]‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(wt)‚à•2absentùîºùëìsuperscriptùë§ùë°delimited-[]ùúÇùõΩ2ùëÑ122superscriptùúÇ2ùêøsuperscriptùõΩ2superscriptùëÑ2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle{\leq}\mathbb{E}f(w^{t})-\left[\frac{\eta\beta(2Q{-}1)}{2}-2\eta^{2}L\beta^{2}Q^{2}\right]\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla f(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2} (62)
+Œ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãQ‚ÄãL2‚Äã(1+4‚ÄãŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãL)2‚Äãn‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1‚à•wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t)‚àíwt‚à•2‚èü=‚Å£:Sa5ùúÇùõΩùëÑsuperscriptùêø214ùúÇùõΩùêø2ùëõùîºsubscript‚èüsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°superscriptùë§ùë°2:absentsubscriptùëÜsubscriptùëé5\displaystyle+\frac{\eta\beta QL^{2}\left(1{+}4\eta\beta L\right)}{2n}\mathbb{E}\underbrace{\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\left\lVert w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}-w^{t}\right\rVert^{2}}_{=:S_{a_{5}}} (63)
+2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãL‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãQ2‚ÄãœÉa2+2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãL‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãQ2‚ÄãŒ≥g2.2superscriptùúÇ2ùêøsuperscriptùõΩ2superscriptùëÑ2superscriptsubscriptùúéùëé22superscriptùúÇ2ùêøsuperscriptùõΩ2superscriptùëÑ2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëî2\displaystyle+2\eta^{2}L\beta^{2}Q^{2}\sigma_{a}^{2}+2\eta^{2}L\beta^{2}Q^{2}\gamma_{g}^{2}. (64)

Thus, it is sufficient to bound the following expression in Sa5subscriptùëÜsubscriptùëé5S_{a_{5}}:

‚à•wt\displaystyle\Big{\lVert}w^{t} ‚àíwi,qŒ©‚Äã(t)‚à•2\displaystyle-w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\Big{\rVert}^{2} (65)
=‚à•‚àës=Œ©‚Äã(t)t‚àí1(ws+1‚àíws)+wŒ©‚Äã(t)‚àíwi,qŒ©‚Äã(t)‚à•2absentsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùë†Œ©ùë°ùë°1superscriptùë§ùë†1superscriptùë§ùë†superscriptùë§Œ©ùë°superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°2\displaystyle=\left\lVert\sum\limits_{s{=}\Omega(t)}^{t{-}1}\left(w^{s{+}1}-w^{s}\right)+w^{\Omega(t)}-w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right\rVert^{2} (66)
‚â§(1+1Œ≤2)‚Äã‚à•‚àës=Œ©‚Äã(t)t‚àí1(ws+1‚àíws)‚à•2+(1+Œ≤2)‚Äã‚à•wŒ©‚Äã(t)‚àíwi,qŒ©‚Äã(t)‚à•2absent11superscriptùõΩ2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùë†Œ©ùë°ùë°1superscriptùë§ùë†1superscriptùë§ùë†21superscriptùõΩ2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptùë§Œ©ùë°superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°2\displaystyle{\leq}\left(1{+}\frac{1}{\beta^{2}}\right)\left\lVert\sum\limits_{s{=}\Omega(t)}^{t{-}1}\left(w^{s{+}1}-w^{s}\right)\right\rVert^{2}+\left(1{+}\beta^{2}\right)\left\lVert w^{\Omega(t)}-w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right\rVert^{2} (67)
‚â§(t‚àíŒ©‚Äã(t))‚Äã(1+1Œ≤2)‚Äã[‚àës=Œ©‚Äã(t)t‚àí1‚à•ws+1‚àíws‚à•2]+(1+Œ≤2)‚Äã‚à•wŒ©‚Äã(t)‚àíwi,qŒ©‚Äã(t)‚à•2absentùë°Œ©ùë°11superscriptùõΩ2delimited-[]superscriptsubscriptùë†Œ©ùë°ùë°1superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptùë§ùë†1superscriptùë§ùë†21superscriptùõΩ2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptùë§Œ©ùë°superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°2\displaystyle{\leq}\left(t{-}\Omega(t)\right)\left(1{+}\frac{1}{\beta^{2}}\right)\left[\sum\limits_{s{=}\Omega(t)}^{t{-}1}\left\lVert w^{s{+}1}-w^{s}\right\rVert^{2}\right]+\left(1{+}\beta^{2}\right)\left\lVert w^{\Omega(t)}-w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right\rVert^{2} (68)
‚â§œÑ‚Äã(1+1Œ≤2)‚Äã[‚àës=t‚àíœÑt‚àí1‚à•ws+1‚àíws‚à•2]‚èü=‚Å£:Sa7+(1+Œ≤2)‚Äã‚à•wŒ©‚Äã(t)‚àíwi,qŒ©‚Äã(t)‚à•2‚èü=‚Å£:Sa6.absentùúè11superscriptùõΩ2subscript‚èüdelimited-[]superscriptsubscriptùë†ùë°ùúèùë°1superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptùë§ùë†1superscriptùë§ùë†2:absentsubscriptùëÜsubscriptùëé71superscriptùõΩ2subscript‚èüsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptùë§Œ©ùë°superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°2:absentsubscriptùëÜsubscriptùëé6\displaystyle{\leq}\tau\left(1{+}\frac{1}{\beta^{2}}\right)\underbrace{\left[\sum\limits_{s{=}t{-}\tau}^{t{-}1}\left\lVert w^{s{+}1}-w^{s}\right\rVert^{2}\right]}_{=:S_{a_{7}}}+\left(1{+}\beta^{2}\right)\underbrace{\left\lVert w^{\Omega(t)}-w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right\rVert^{2}}_{=:S_{a_{6}}}. (69)

Now, we show a bound on the evolution of local updates at an arbitrary round s‚â•0ùë†0s\geq 0, i.e., the distance between wi,qssuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûùë†w_{i,q}^{s} and wssuperscriptùë§ùë†w^{s}:

ùîº‚Äã‚à•wi,qs‚àíws‚à•2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûùë†superscriptùë§ùë†2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left\lVert w_{i,q}^{s}-w^{s}\right\rVert^{2} =ùîº‚Äã‚à•wi,q‚àí1s‚àíŒ∑‚Äã‚àá~‚Äãfi‚Äã(wi,q‚àí1s)‚àíws‚à•2absentùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëû1ùë†ùúÇ~‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëû1ùë†superscriptùë§ùë†2\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\left\lVert w_{i,q{-}1}^{s}-\eta\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(w_{i,q{-}1}^{s}\right)-w^{s}\right\rVert^{2} (70)
=ùîº‚à•wi,q‚àí1s‚àíws‚àíŒ∑‚àáf(ws)\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}w_{i,q{-}1}^{s}-w^{s}-\eta\nabla f\left(w^{s}\right)
‚àíŒ∑‚Äã‚àá~‚Äãfi‚Äã(wi,q‚àí1s)+Œ∑‚Äã‚àáfi‚Äã(wi,q‚àí1s)ùúÇ~‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëû1ùë†ùúÇ‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëû1ùë†\displaystyle\quad-\eta\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(w_{i,q{-}1}^{s}\right)+\eta\nabla f_{i}\left(w_{i,q{-}1}^{s}\right)
‚àíŒ∑‚Äã‚àáfi‚Äã(wi,q‚àí1s)+Œ∑‚Äã‚àáfi‚Äã(ws)ùúÇ‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëû1ùë†ùúÇ‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptùë§ùë†\displaystyle\quad-\eta\nabla f_{i}\left(w_{i,q{-}1}^{s}\right)+\eta\nabla f_{i}\left(w^{s}\right)
‚àíŒ∑‚àáfi(ws)+Œ∑‚àáf(ws)‚à•2\displaystyle\quad-\eta\nabla f_{i}\left(w^{s}\right)+\eta\nabla f\left(w^{s}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2} (71)
‚â§(1+12‚ÄãQ)‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•wi,q‚àí1s‚àíws‚à•2absent112ùëÑùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëû1ùë†superscriptùë§ùë†2\displaystyle{\leq}\left(1{+}\frac{1}{2Q}\right)\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}w_{i,q{-}1}^{s}-w^{s}\Big{\rVert}^{2} (72)
+4(1+2Q)Œ∑2ùîº[‚à•‚àá~fi(wi,q‚àí1s)‚àí‚àáfi(wi,q‚àí1s)‚à•2\displaystyle+\hskip 10.00002pt4(1{+}2Q)\eta^{2}\mathbb{E}\Bigg{[}\Big{\lVert}\tilde{\nabla}f_{i}\left(w_{i,q{-}1}^{s}\right)-\nabla f_{i}\left(w_{i,q{-}1}^{s}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}
+‚à•‚àáfi‚Äã(wi,q‚àí1s)‚àí‚àáfi‚Äã(ws)‚à•2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëû1ùë†‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptùë§ùë†2\displaystyle\hskip 71.00017pt+\Big{\lVert}\nabla f_{i}\left(w_{i,q{-}1}^{s}\right)-\nabla f_{i}\left(w^{s}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}
+‚à•‚àáfi‚Äã(ws)‚àí‚àáf‚Äã(ws)‚à•2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptùë§ùë†‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§ùë†2\displaystyle\hskip 71.00017pt+\Big{\lVert}\nabla f_{i}\left(w^{s}\right)-\nabla f\left(w^{s}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}
+‚à•‚àáf(ws)‚à•2]\displaystyle\hskip 71.00017pt+\Big{\lVert}\nabla f\left(w^{s}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}\Bigg{]} (73)
‚â§(1+12‚ÄãQ)‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•wi,q‚àí1s‚àíws‚à•2absent112ùëÑùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëû1ùë†superscriptùë§ùë†2\displaystyle{\leq}\left(1{+}\frac{1}{2Q}\right)\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}w_{i,q{-}1}^{s}-w^{s}\Big{\rVert}^{2} (74)
+4(1+2Q)Œ∑2[œÉa2+L2ùîº‚à•wi,q‚àí1s‚àíws‚à•2\displaystyle+\hskip 10.00002pt4(1{+}2Q)\eta^{2}\Bigg{[}\sigma_{a}^{2}+L^{2}\,\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}w_{i,q{-}1}^{s}-w^{s}\Big{\rVert}^{2}
+ùîº‚à•‚àáfi(ws)‚àí‚àáf(ws)‚à•2+ùîº‚à•‚àáf(ws)‚à•2].\displaystyle\hskip 71.00017pt+\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla f_{i}\left(w^{s}\right)-\nabla f\left(w^{s}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}+\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla f\left(w^{s}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}\Bigg{]}. (75)

Note that we can select stepsize Œ∑‚â§14‚ÄãL‚Äã(Q+1)ùúÇ14ùêøùëÑ1\eta\leq\frac{1}{4L(Q{+}1)} such that

Œ∑2‚â§116‚ÄãL2‚Äã(Q+1)2‚â§18‚ÄãL2‚ÄãQ‚Äã(2‚ÄãQ+1)‚áí4‚Äã(1+2‚ÄãQ)‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãL2‚â§12‚ÄãQ,superscriptùúÇ2116superscriptùêø2superscriptùëÑ1218superscriptùêø2ùëÑ2ùëÑ1‚áí412ùëÑsuperscriptùúÇ2superscriptùêø212ùëÑ\displaystyle\eta^{2}\leq\frac{1}{16L^{2}(Q{+}1)^{2}}\leq\frac{1}{8L^{2}Q(2Q{+}1)}\Rightarrow 4(1{+}2Q)\eta^{2}L^{2}\leq\frac{1}{2Q}, (76)

therefore, due to (70)-(76), we have:

ùîº‚Äã‚à•wi,qs‚àíws‚à•2‚èü:=Pi,qs‚â§(1+1Q)‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•wi,q‚àí1s‚àíws‚à•2‚èü:=Pi,q‚àí1ssubscript‚èüùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûùë†superscriptùë§ùë†2assignabsentsuperscriptsubscriptùëÉùëñùëûùë†subscript‚èü11ùëÑùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëû1ùë†superscriptùë§ùë†2assignabsentsuperscriptsubscriptùëÉùëñùëû1ùë†\displaystyle\underbrace{\mathbb{E}\left\lVert w_{i,q}^{s}-w^{s}\right\rVert^{2}}_{:=P_{i,q}^{s}}\leq\underbrace{\left(1{+}\frac{1}{Q}\right)\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}w_{i,q{-}1}^{s}-w^{s}\Big{\rVert}^{2}}_{:=P_{i,q{-}1}^{s}} (77)
+4‚Äã(1+2‚ÄãQ)‚ÄãŒ∑2‚Äã[œÉa2+ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáfi‚Äã(ws)‚àí‚àáf‚Äã(ws)‚à•2+ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(ws)‚à•2]‚èü:=Ris‚áí‚áísubscript‚èü412ùëÑsuperscriptùúÇ2delimited-[]superscriptsubscriptùúéùëé2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptùë§ùë†‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§ùë†2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§ùë†2assignabsentsuperscriptsubscriptùëÖùëñùë†absent\displaystyle\qquad\quad+\underbrace{4(1{+}2Q)\eta^{2}\Bigg{[}\sigma_{a}^{2}+\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla f_{i}\left(w^{s}\right)-\nabla f\left(w^{s}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}+\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla f\left(w^{s}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}\Bigg{]}}_{:=R_{i}^{s}}\Rightarrow (78)
Pi,qssuperscriptsubscriptùëÉùëñùëûùë†\displaystyle P_{i,q}^{s} ‚â§(1+1Q)‚ÄãPi,q‚àí1s+Risabsent11ùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùëÉùëñùëû1ùë†superscriptsubscriptùëÖùëñùë†\displaystyle\leq\left(1{+}\frac{1}{Q}\right)P_{i,q{-}1}^{s}+R_{i}^{s} (79)
=Ris‚Äã‚àëk=0q‚àí1(1+1Q)k‚â§Ris‚Äã‚àëk=0Q‚àí1(1+1Q)kabsentsuperscriptsubscriptùëÖùëñùë†superscriptsubscriptùëò0ùëû1superscript11ùëÑùëòsuperscriptsubscriptùëÖùëñùë†superscriptsubscriptùëò0ùëÑ1superscript11ùëÑùëò\displaystyle=R_{i}^{s}\sum\limits_{k=0}^{q{-}1}\left(1{+}\frac{1}{Q}\right)^{k}\leq R_{i}^{s}\sum\limits_{k=0}^{Q{-}1}\left(1{+}\frac{1}{Q}\right)^{k} (80)
=Ris‚Äã(1+1Q)Q‚àí1(1+1Q)‚àí1=Ris‚ÄãQ‚Äã[(1+1Q)Q‚àí1]‚â§Ris‚ÄãQ‚Äã(e‚àí1)‚â§2‚ÄãRis‚ÄãQ‚áíabsentsuperscriptsubscriptùëÖùëñùë†superscript11ùëÑùëÑ111ùëÑ1superscriptsubscriptùëÖùëñùë†ùëÑdelimited-[]superscript11ùëÑùëÑ1superscriptsubscriptùëÖùëñùë†ùëÑùëí12superscriptsubscriptùëÖùëñùë†ùëÑ‚áíabsent\displaystyle=R_{i}^{s}\frac{\left(1{+}\frac{1}{Q}\right)^{Q}-1}{\left(1{+}\frac{1}{Q}\right)-1}=R_{i}^{s}Q\left[\left(1{+}\frac{1}{Q}\right)^{Q}-1\right]\leq R_{i}^{s}Q(e-1)\leq 2R_{i}^{s}Q\Rightarrow (81)
ùîºùîº\displaystyle\mathbb{E} ‚à•wi,qs‚àíws‚à•2‚â§8‚ÄãQ‚Äã(1+2‚ÄãQ)‚ÄãŒ∑2‚Äã[œÉa2+ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáfi‚Äã(ws)‚àí‚àáf‚Äã(ws)‚à•2+ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(ws)‚à•2],superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûùë†superscriptùë§ùë†28ùëÑ12ùëÑsuperscriptùúÇ2delimited-[]superscriptsubscriptùúéùëé2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsuperscriptùë§ùë†‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§ùë†2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§ùë†2\displaystyle\left\lVert w_{i,q}^{s}-w^{s}\right\rVert^{2}\leq 8Q(1{+}2Q)\eta^{2}\Bigg{[}\sigma_{a}^{2}+\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla f_{i}\left(w^{s}\right)-\nabla f\left(w^{s}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}+\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla f\left(w^{s}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}\Bigg{]}, (82)

for all q‚àà[Q]ùëûdelimited-[]ùëÑq\in[Q] and s‚â•0ùë†0s\geq 0. We now will use (70)-(82) to provide a bound on the expression in Sa7subscriptùëÜsubscriptùëé7S_{a_{7}}. Again, note that according to Algorithms 1 & 2, we have:

ws+1superscriptùë§ùë†1\displaystyle w^{s{+}1} =ws‚àíŒ≤‚Äã(wis,0Œ©‚Äã(s)‚àíwis,QŒ©‚Äã(s))‚áíabsentsuperscriptùë§ùë†ùõΩsuperscriptsubscriptùë§subscriptùëñùë†0Œ©ùë†superscriptsubscriptùë§subscriptùëñùë†ùëÑŒ©ùë†‚áíabsent\displaystyle=w^{s}-\beta\left(w_{i_{s},0}^{\Omega(s)}-w_{i_{s},Q}^{\Omega(s)}\right)\Rightarrow (83)
ùîº‚Äã‚à•ws+1‚àíws‚à•2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptùë§ùë†1superscriptùë§ùë†2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left\lVert w^{s{+}1}-w^{s}\right\rVert^{2} ‚â§Œ≤2‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•wis,QŒ©‚Äã(s)‚àíwŒ©‚Äã(s)‚à•2absentsuperscriptùõΩ2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùë§subscriptùëñùë†ùëÑŒ©ùë†superscriptùë§Œ©ùë†2\displaystyle\leq\beta^{2}\,\mathbb{E}\left\lVert w_{i_{s},Q}^{\Omega(s)}-w^{\Omega(s)}\right\rVert^{2} (84)
=Œ≤2‚Äãùîº‚Äã[ùîºis‚Äã‚à•wis,QŒ©‚Äã(s)‚àíwŒ©‚Äã(s)‚à•2]absentsuperscriptùõΩ2ùîºdelimited-[]subscriptùîºsubscriptùëñùë†superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùë§subscriptùëñùë†ùëÑŒ©ùë†superscriptùë§Œ©ùë†2\displaystyle=\beta^{2}\,\mathbb{E}\left[\mathbb{E}_{i_{s}}\left\lVert w_{i_{s},Q}^{\Omega(s)}-w^{\Omega(s)}\right\rVert^{2}\right] (85)
=Œ≤2n‚Äã‚àëj=1nùîº‚Äã‚à•wj,QŒ©‚Äã(s)‚àíwŒ©‚Äã(s)‚à•2absentsuperscriptùõΩ2ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëó1ùëõùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëóùëÑŒ©ùë†superscriptùë§Œ©ùë†2\displaystyle=\frac{\beta^{2}}{n}\sum\limits_{j{=}1}^{n}\mathbb{E}\left\lVert w_{j,Q}^{\Omega(s)}-w^{\Omega(s)}\right\rVert^{2} (86)
‚â§8‚ÄãQ‚Äã(1+2‚ÄãQ)‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãŒ≤2‚Äã[œÉa2+Œ≥g2+ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(wŒ©‚Äã(s))‚à•2].absent8ùëÑ12ùëÑsuperscriptùúÇ2superscriptùõΩ2delimited-[]superscriptsubscriptùúéùëé2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëî2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§Œ©ùë†2\displaystyle\leq 8Q(1{+}2Q)\eta^{2}\beta^{2}\Bigg{[}\sigma_{a}^{2}+\gamma_{g}^{2}+\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla f\left(w^{\Omega(s)}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}\Bigg{]}. (87)

Let œï=8‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãQ2‚Äã(1+2‚ÄãQ)‚Äã(1+Œ≤2)italic-œï8superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùëÑ212ùëÑ1superscriptùõΩ2\phi=8\eta^{2}Q^{2}(1{+}2Q)(1{+}\beta^{2}), then according to (65)-(87)

1n‚Äãœï‚Äãùîº‚Äã[Sa5]1ùëõitalic-œïùîºdelimited-[]subscriptùëÜsubscriptùëé5\displaystyle\frac{1}{n\phi}\mathbb{E}[S_{a_{5}}] ‚â§œÑ‚Äã[‚àës=t‚àíœÑt‚àí1‚à•ws+1‚àíws‚à•2]+1n‚ÄãQ‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1‚à•wŒ©‚Äã(t)‚àíwi,qŒ©‚Äã(t)‚à•2.absentùúèdelimited-[]superscriptsubscriptùë†ùë°ùúèùë°1superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptùë§ùë†1superscriptùë§ùë†21ùëõùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptùë§Œ©ùë°superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°2\displaystyle\leq\tau\left[\sum\limits_{s{=}t{-}\tau}^{t{-}1}\left\lVert w^{s{+}1}-w^{s}\right\rVert^{2}\right]+\frac{1}{nQ}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\sum_{q=0}^{Q{-}1}\left\lVert w^{\Omega(t)}-w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right\rVert^{2}. (88)
‚â§œÑ2‚ÄãœÉa2+œÑ2‚ÄãŒ≥g2+œÑ‚Äã‚àës=t‚àíœÑt‚àí1ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(wŒ©‚Äã(s))‚à•2absentsuperscriptùúè2superscriptsubscriptùúéùëé2superscriptùúè2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëî2ùúèsuperscriptsubscriptùë†ùë°ùúèùë°1ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§Œ©ùë†2\displaystyle\leq\tau^{2}\sigma_{a}^{2}+\tau^{2}\gamma_{g}^{2}+\tau\sum_{s=t{-}\tau}^{t{-}1}\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla f\left(w^{\Omega(s)}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2} (89)
+œÉa2+Œ≥g2+ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(wŒ©‚Äã(t))‚à•2superscriptsubscriptùúéùëé2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëî2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§Œ©ùë°2\displaystyle+\sigma_{a}^{2}+\gamma_{g}^{2}+\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla f\left(w^{\Omega(t)}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2} (90)
‚â§(œÑ2+1)‚Äã[œÉa2+Œ≥g2]+ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(wŒ©‚Äã(t))‚à•2+œÑ‚Äã‚àës=t‚àíœÑt‚àí1ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(wŒ©‚Äã(s))‚à•2absentsuperscriptùúè21delimited-[]superscriptsubscriptùúéùëé2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëî2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§Œ©ùë°2ùúèsuperscriptsubscriptùë†ùë°ùúèùë°1ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§Œ©ùë†2\displaystyle\leq(\tau^{2}{+}1)\left[\sigma_{a}^{2}+\gamma_{g}^{2}\right]+\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla f\left(w^{\Omega(t)}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}+\tau\sum_{s=t{-}\tau}^{t{-}1}\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla f\left(w^{\Omega(s)}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2} (91)
‚â§(œÑ2+1)‚Äã[œÉa2+Œ≥g2]+œÑ‚Äã‚àës=t‚àíœÑtùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(wŒ©‚Äã(s))‚à•2.absentsuperscriptùúè21delimited-[]superscriptsubscriptùúéùëé2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëî2ùúèsuperscriptsubscriptùë†ùë°ùúèùë°ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§Œ©ùë†2\displaystyle\leq(\tau^{2}{+}1)\left[\sigma_{a}^{2}+\gamma_{g}^{2}\right]+\tau\sum_{s=t{-}\tau}^{t}\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla f\left(w^{\Omega(s)}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}. (92)

Thus, by combining (59)-(92), we have the following inequality:

ùîº‚Äãf‚Äã(wt+1)ùîºùëìsuperscriptùë§ùë°1\displaystyle\mathbb{E}f\left(w^{t{+}1}\right) ‚â§ùîº‚Äãf‚Äã(wt)‚àíŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚Äã[2‚ÄãQ‚àí12‚àí2‚ÄãŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãL‚ÄãQ2]‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(wt)‚à•2absentùîºùëìsuperscriptùë§ùë°ùúÇùõΩdelimited-[]2ùëÑ122ùúÇùõΩùêøsuperscriptùëÑ2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}f(w^{t})-\eta\beta\left[\frac{2Q{-}1}{2}-2\eta\beta LQ^{2}\right]\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla f(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2} (93)
+4‚ÄãŒ∑3‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãL2‚ÄãQ3‚Äã(1+2‚ÄãQ)‚Äã(1+Œ≤2)‚Äã(1+4‚ÄãŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãL)‚ÄãœÑ‚Äã[‚àës=t‚àíœÑtùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(wŒ©‚Äã(s))‚à•2]4superscriptùúÇ3ùõΩsuperscriptùêø2superscriptùëÑ312ùëÑ1superscriptùõΩ214ùúÇùõΩùêøùúèdelimited-[]superscriptsubscriptùë†ùë°ùúèùë°ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§Œ©ùë†2\displaystyle+4\eta^{3}\beta L^{2}Q^{3}(1{+}2Q)(1{+}\beta^{2})(1{+}4\eta\beta L)\,\tau\left[\sum\limits_{s{=}t{-}\tau}^{t}\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla f\left(w^{\Omega(s)}\right)\right\rVert^{2}\right] (94)
+4‚ÄãŒ∑3‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãL2‚ÄãQ3‚Äã(1+2‚ÄãQ)‚Äã(œÑ2+1)‚Äã(1+Œ≤2)‚Äã(1+4‚ÄãŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãL)‚Äã(œÉa2+Œ≥g2)4superscriptùúÇ3ùõΩsuperscriptùêø2superscriptùëÑ312ùëÑsuperscriptùúè211superscriptùõΩ214ùúÇùõΩùêøsuperscriptsubscriptùúéùëé2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëî2\displaystyle+4\eta^{3}\beta L^{2}Q^{3}(1{+}2Q)(\tau^{2}{+}1)(1{+}\beta^{2})(1{+}4\eta\beta L)\left(\sigma_{a}^{2}+\gamma_{g}^{2}\right) (95)
+2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãL‚ÄãQ2‚Äã(œÉa2+Œ≥g2),2superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùõΩ2ùêøsuperscriptùëÑ2superscriptsubscriptùúéùëé2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëî2\displaystyle+2\eta^{2}\beta^{2}LQ^{2}\left(\sigma_{a}^{2}+\gamma_{g}^{2}\right), (96)

where by rearranging, we obtain the following inequality:

(1‚àí4‚ÄãŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãL‚ÄãQ)‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(wt)‚à•214ùúÇùõΩùêøùëÑùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle\left(1-4\eta\beta LQ\right)\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla f(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2} (97)
‚àí8‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãL2‚ÄãQ2‚Äã(1+2‚ÄãQ)‚Äã(1+Œ≤2)‚Äã(1+4‚ÄãŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãL)‚ÄãœÑ‚Äã[‚àës=t‚àíœÑtùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(wŒ©‚Äã(s))‚à•2]8superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùêø2superscriptùëÑ212ùëÑ1superscriptùõΩ214ùúÇùõΩùêøùúèdelimited-[]superscriptsubscriptùë†ùë°ùúèùë°ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§Œ©ùë†2\displaystyle\qquad-8\eta^{2}L^{2}Q^{2}(1{+}2Q)(1{+}\beta^{2})(1{+}4\eta\beta L)\,\tau\left[\sum\limits_{s{=}t{-}\tau}^{t}\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla f\left(w^{\Omega(s)}\right)\right\rVert^{2}\right] (98)
‚â§2‚Äã[ùîº‚Äãf‚Äã(wt)‚àíùîº‚Äãf‚Äã(wt+1)]Œ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãQabsent2delimited-[]ùîºùëìsuperscriptùë§ùë°ùîºùëìsuperscriptùë§ùë°1ùúÇùõΩùëÑ\displaystyle\leq\frac{2\left[\mathbb{E}f(w^{t})-\mathbb{E}f\left(w^{t{+}1}\right)\right]}{\eta\beta Q} (99)
+8‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãL2‚ÄãQ2‚Äã(1+2‚ÄãQ)‚Äã(œÑ2+1)‚Äã(1+Œ≤2)‚Äã(1+4‚ÄãŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãL)‚Äã(œÉa2+Œ≥g2)8superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùêø2superscriptùëÑ212ùëÑsuperscriptùúè211superscriptùõΩ214ùúÇùõΩùêøsuperscriptsubscriptùúéùëé2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëî2\displaystyle\qquad+8\eta^{2}L^{2}Q^{2}(1{+}2Q)(\tau^{2}{+}1)(1{+}\beta^{2})(1{+}4\eta\beta L)\left(\sigma_{a}^{2}+\gamma_{g}^{2}\right) (100)
+4‚ÄãŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãL‚ÄãQ‚Äã(œÉa2+Œ≥g2).4ùúÇùõΩùêøùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùúéùëé2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëî2\displaystyle\qquad+4\eta\beta LQ\left(\sigma_{a}^{2}+\gamma_{g}^{2}\right). (101)

Now, note that for any s‚â•0ùë†0s\geq 0,666For s<œÑùë†ùúès<\tau, the right-hand side of the inequality consists of fewer terms.

ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(wŒ©‚Äã(s))‚à•2‚â§‚àëu=s‚àíœÑsùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(wu)‚à•2,ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§Œ©ùë†2superscriptsubscriptùë¢ùë†ùúèùë†ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsuperscriptùë§ùë¢2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla f\left(w^{\Omega(s)}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}\leq\sum_{u=s-\tau}^{s}\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla f\left(w^{u}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}, (102)

Therefore, we add up the inequality in (97)-(101), for t=0,1,‚Ä¶‚ÄãT‚àí1ùë°01‚Ä¶ùëá1t=0,1,\dots T{-}1, and obtain

[1‚àí4Œ∑Œ≤LQ‚àí8Œ∑2L2\displaystyle\big{[}1-4\eta\beta LQ-8\eta^{2}L^{2} Q2(1+2Q)œÑ(œÑ+1)2(1+Œ≤2)(1+4Œ∑Œ≤L)]‚àët=0T‚àí1ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(wt)‚à•2T\displaystyle Q^{2}(1{+}2Q)\tau(\tau{+}1)^{2}(1{+}\beta^{2})(1{+}4\eta\beta L)\big{]}\frac{\sum\limits_{t=0}^{T{-}1}\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla f(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2}}{T} (103)
‚â§2‚Äã[f‚Äã(w0)‚àíùîº‚Äãf‚Äã(wT)]Œ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãQ‚ÄãTabsent2delimited-[]ùëìsuperscriptùë§0ùîºùëìsuperscriptùë§ùëáùúÇùõΩùëÑùëá\displaystyle\leq\frac{2\left[f(w^{0})-\mathbb{E}f(w^{T})\right]}{\eta\beta QT} +4‚ÄãŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãL‚ÄãQ‚Äã(œÉa2+Œ≥g2)4ùúÇùõΩùêøùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùúéùëé2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëî2\displaystyle+4\eta\beta LQ\left(\sigma_{a}^{2}+\gamma_{g}^{2}\right) (104)
+8‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãL2‚ÄãQ2‚Äã(1+2‚ÄãQ)‚Äã(œÑ2+1)‚Äã(1+Œ≤2)‚Äã(1+4‚ÄãŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãL)‚Äã(œÉa2+Œ≥g2).8superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùêø2superscriptùëÑ212ùëÑsuperscriptùúè211superscriptùõΩ214ùúÇùõΩùêøsuperscriptsubscriptùúéùëé2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëî2\displaystyle+8\eta^{2}L^{2}Q^{2}(1{+}2Q)(\tau^{2}{+}1)(1{+}\beta^{2})(1{+}4\eta\beta L)\left(\sigma_{a}^{2}+\gamma_{g}^{2}\right). (105)

Thus, by setting Œ≤=1ùõΩ1\beta=1 and Œ∑=1Q‚ÄãL‚ÄãTùúÇ1ùëÑùêøùëá\eta=\frac{1}{Q\sqrt{LT}}, we can simply see that

1‚àí4‚ÄãŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãL‚ÄãQ‚àí8‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãL214ùúÇùõΩùêøùëÑ8superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùêø2\displaystyle 1-4\eta\beta LQ-8\eta^{2}L^{2} Q2‚Äã(1+2‚ÄãQ)‚ÄãœÑ‚Äã(œÑ+1)2‚Äã(1+Œ≤2)‚Äã(1+4‚ÄãŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãL)‚â•12,superscriptùëÑ212ùëÑùúèsuperscriptùúè121superscriptùõΩ214ùúÇùõΩùêø12\displaystyle Q^{2}(1{+}2Q)\tau(\tau{+}1)^{2}(1{+}\beta^{2})(1{+}4\eta\beta L)\geq\frac{1}{2}, (106)
Œ∑‚â§14‚ÄãL‚Äã(Q+1),ùúÇ14ùêøùëÑ1\displaystyle\eta\leq\frac{1}{4L(Q{+}1)}, (107)

for T‚â•160‚ÄãL‚Äã(Q+7)‚Äã(œÑ+1)3ùëá160ùêøùëÑ7superscriptùúè13T\geq 160L(Q{+}7)(\tau{+}1)^{3}. Therefore, we can conclude the final result in Theorem 1 under this choice of Œ∑ùúÇ\eta and Œ≤ùõΩ\beta. ‚àé

Appendix B Personalized Asynchronous Federated Learning: MAML

Proof of Theorem 2.

To simplify (9), we denote ‚àá~‚ÄãFi(b)‚Äã(w)=‚àáF~i(b)‚Äã(w,ùíüi‚Ä≤‚Ä≤,ùíüi‚Ä≤,ùíüi)~‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñùë§‚àásubscriptsuperscript~ùêπùëèùëñùë§superscriptsubscriptùíüùëñ‚Ä≤‚Ä≤superscriptsubscriptùíüùëñ‚Ä≤subscriptùíüùëñ\tilde{\nabla}F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w\right)=\nabla\tilde{F}^{(b)}_{i}\left(w,\mathcal{D}_{i}^{\prime\prime},\mathcal{D}_{i}^{\prime},\mathcal{D}_{i}\right). Then similar to (34), at round tùë°t, the update rule for Option B can be written as follows:

wt+1=wt‚àíŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚Äã‚àëq=0Q‚àí1‚àá~‚ÄãFit(b)‚Äã(wit,qŒ©‚Äã(t)).superscriptùë§ùë°1superscriptùë§ùë°ùúÇùõΩsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1~‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèsubscriptùëñùë°superscriptsubscriptùë§subscriptùëñùë°ùëûŒ©ùë°\displaystyle w^{t{+}1}=w^{t}-\eta\beta\sum\limits_{q=0}^{Q{-}1}\tilde{\nabla}F^{(b)}_{i_{t}}\left(w_{i_{t},q}^{\Omega(t)}\right). (108)

According to Lemma 1,

F(b)‚Äã(wt+1)‚Äã‚â§(‚Äã12‚Äã)‚ÄãF(b)‚Äã(wt)superscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°1italic-(12italic-)superscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°\displaystyle F^{(b)}\left(w^{t{+}1}\right)\overset{\eqref{eq:smoothness}}{\leq}F^{(b)}(w^{t}) ‚àíŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚Äã‚ü®‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt),‚àëq=0Q‚àí1‚àá~‚ÄãFit(b)‚Äã(wit,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚ü©‚èü=‚Å£:Sb1ùúÇùõΩsubscript‚èü‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°superscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1~‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèsubscriptùëñùë°superscriptsubscriptùë§subscriptùëñùë°ùëûŒ©ùë°:absentsubscriptùëÜsubscriptùëè1\displaystyle-\eta\beta\underbrace{\left\langle\nabla F^{(b)}(w^{t}),\sum\limits_{q=0}^{Q{-}1}\tilde{\nabla}F^{(b)}_{i_{t}}\left(w_{i_{t},q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)\right\rangle}_{=:S_{b_{1}}}
+Lb‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãŒ≤22‚Äã‚à•‚àëq=0Q‚àí1‚àá~‚ÄãFit(b)‚Äã(wit,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚à•2‚èü=‚Å£:Sb2subscriptùêøùëèsuperscriptùúÇ2superscriptùõΩ22subscript‚èüsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1~‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèsubscriptùëñùë°superscriptsubscriptùë§subscriptùëñùë°ùëûŒ©ùë°2:absentsubscriptùëÜsubscriptùëè2\displaystyle+\frac{L_{b}\eta^{2}\beta^{2}}{2}\underbrace{\left\lVert\sum\limits_{q=0}^{Q{-}1}\tilde{\nabla}F^{(b)}_{i_{t}}\left(w_{i_{t},q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)\right\rVert^{2}}_{=:S_{b_{2}}} (109)

Similar to the inequalities in (36)-(41), we first show a lower bound on term Sb1subscriptùëÜsubscriptùëè1S_{b_{1}} in (B). We also denote g~it=‚àëq=0Q‚àí1‚àá~‚ÄãFi(b)‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))superscriptsubscript~ùëîùëñùë°superscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1~‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°\tilde{g}_{i}^{t}=\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\tilde{\nabla}F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right), g~t=1n‚Äã‚àëi=1ng~itsuperscript~ùëîùë°1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscript~ùëîùëñùë°\tilde{g}^{t}=\frac{1}{n}\sum\limits_{i{=}1}^{n}\tilde{g}_{i}^{t}, git=‚àëq=0Q‚àí1‚àáFi(b)‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))superscriptsubscriptùëîùëñùë°superscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°g_{i}^{t}=\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right), and gt=1n‚Äã‚àëi=1ngitsuperscriptùëîùë°1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëîùëñùë°g^{t}=\frac{1}{n}\sum\limits_{i{=}1}^{n}g_{i}^{t} for simplicity. Note that g~itsuperscriptsubscript~ùëîùëñùë°\tilde{g}_{i}^{t} and gitsuperscriptsubscriptùëîùëñùë°g_{i}^{t} are the stochastic and deterministic gradients of the personalized cost functions Fi(b)subscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñF^{(b)}_{i} at stale parameters. According to these definitions, we have

‚à•ùîº‚Äã[g~t‚àígt]‚à•delimited-‚à•‚à•ùîºdelimited-[]superscript~ùëîùë°superscriptùëîùë°\displaystyle\left\lVert\mathbb{E}\left[\tilde{g}^{t}-g^{t}\right]\right\rVert ‚â§1n‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚à•ùîº‚Äã[g~it‚àígit]‚à•absent1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõdelimited-‚à•‚à•ùîºdelimited-[]superscriptsubscript~ùëîùëñùë°superscriptsubscriptùëîùëñùë°\displaystyle{\leq}\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\left\lVert\mathbb{E}\left[\tilde{g}_{i}^{t}-g_{i}^{t}\right]\right\rVert (110)
‚â§1n‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1‚à•ùîº‚Äã[‚àá~‚ÄãFi(b)‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáFi(b)‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))]‚à•absent1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1delimited-‚à•‚à•ùîºdelimited-[]~‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°\displaystyle{\leq}\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\sum_{q=0}^{Q{-}1}\left\lVert\mathbb{E}\left[\tilde{\nabla}F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)\right]\right\rVert (111)
‚â§1n‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1Œºb=Q‚ÄãŒºb,absent1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1subscriptùúáùëèùëÑsubscriptùúáùëè\displaystyle{\leq}\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\sum_{q=0}^{Q{-}1}\mu_{b}=Q\mu_{b}, (112)

where as we discussed in (22), Œºbsubscriptùúáùëè\mu_{b} measures the unbiasedness in the estimation of the personalized stochastic gradient.

ùîº‚Äã[Sb1]ùîºdelimited-[]subscriptùëÜsubscriptùëè1\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[S_{b_{1}}\right] =ùîº‚Äã[ùîºit‚Äã‚ü®‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt),g~itt‚ü©]absentùîºdelimited-[]subscriptùîºsubscriptùëñùë°‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°superscriptsubscript~ùëîsubscriptùëñùë°ùë°\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\left[\mathbb{E}_{i_{t}}\left\langle\nabla F^{(b)}(w^{t}),\tilde{g}_{i_{t}}^{t}\right\rangle\right] (113)
=ùîº‚Äã[‚ü®‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt),1n‚Äã‚àëi=1ng~it‚ü©]=ùîº‚Äã[‚ü®‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt),g~t‚ü©]absentùîºdelimited-[]‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscript~ùëîùëñùë°ùîºdelimited-[]‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°superscript~ùëîùë°\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\left[\left\langle\nabla F^{(b)}(w^{t}),\frac{1}{n}\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\tilde{g}_{i}^{t}\right\rangle\right]=\mathbb{E}\left[\left\langle\nabla F^{(b)}(w^{t}),\tilde{g}^{t}\right\rangle\right] (114)
=Q‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•2+ùîº‚Äã‚ü®‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt),ùîº‚Äã[g~t‚àígt]‚ü©absentùëÑùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°2ùîº‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°ùîºdelimited-[]superscript~ùëîùë°superscriptùëîùë°\displaystyle=Q\,\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla F^{(b)}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2}+\mathbb{E}\left\langle\nabla F^{(b)}(w^{t}),\mathbb{E}\left[\tilde{g}^{t}-g^{t}\right]\right\rangle (115)
+ùîº‚Äã‚ü®‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt),gt‚àíQ‚Äã‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚ü©ùîº‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°superscriptùëîùë°ùëÑ‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°\displaystyle+\mathbb{E}\left\langle\nabla F^{(b)}(w^{t}),g^{t}-Q\nabla F^{(b)}(w^{t})\right\rangle (116)
‚â•Q‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•2‚àí14‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•2‚àí‚à•ùîº‚Äã[gt‚àíg~t]‚à•2absentùëÑùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°214ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•ùîºdelimited-[]superscriptùëîùë°superscript~ùëîùë°2\displaystyle{\geq}Q\,\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla F^{(b)}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2}-\frac{1}{4}\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla F^{(b)}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2}-\left\lVert\mathbb{E}\left[g^{t}-\tilde{g}^{t}\right]\right\rVert^{2} (117)
‚àí14‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•2‚àíùîº‚Äã‚à•gt‚àíQ‚Äã‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•214ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptùëîùë°ùëÑ‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle-\frac{1}{4}\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla F^{(b)}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2}-\mathbb{E}\left\lVert g^{t}-Q\nabla F^{(b)}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2} (118)
‚â•2‚ÄãQ‚àí12‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•2‚àíùîº‚Äã‚à•gt‚àíQ‚Äã‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•2‚àíQ2‚ÄãŒºb2,absent2ùëÑ12ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptùëîùë°ùëÑ‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°2superscriptùëÑ2superscriptsubscriptùúáùëè2\displaystyle{\geq}\frac{2Q{-}1}{2}\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla F^{(b)}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2}-\mathbb{E}\left\lVert g^{t}-Q\nabla F^{(b)}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2}-Q^{2}\mu_{b}^{2}, (119)

and

ùîºit‚Äã[Sb2]=ùîºit‚Äã‚à•‚àëq=0Q‚àí1‚àá~‚ÄãFit(b)‚Äã(wit,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚à•2=1n‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚à•g~it‚à•2.subscriptùîºsubscriptùëñùë°delimited-[]subscriptùëÜsubscriptùëè2subscriptùîºsubscriptùëñùë°superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1~‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèsubscriptùëñùë°superscriptsubscriptùë§subscriptùëñùë°ùëûŒ©ùë°21ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscript~ùëîùëñùë°2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}_{i_{t}}\left[S_{b_{2}}\right]=\mathbb{E}_{i_{t}}\left\lVert\sum\limits_{q=0}^{Q{-}1}\tilde{\nabla}F^{(b)}_{i_{t}}\left(w_{i_{t},q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)\right\rVert^{2}=\frac{1}{n}\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\left\lVert\tilde{g}_{i}^{t}\right\rVert^{2}. (120)

Therefore, according to (B), (119), and (120),

ùîº‚ÄãF(b)‚Äã(wt+1)ùîºsuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°1\displaystyle\mathbb{E}F^{(b)}\left(w^{t{+}1}\right) ‚â§ùîº‚ÄãF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚àíŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚Äã(2‚ÄãQ‚àí1)2‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•2+Œ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãQ2‚ÄãŒºb2absentùîºsuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°ùúÇùõΩ2ùëÑ12ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°2ùúÇùõΩsuperscriptùëÑ2superscriptsubscriptùúáùëè2\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}F^{(b)}(w^{t})-\frac{\eta\beta(2Q{-}1)}{2}\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla F^{(b)}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2}+\eta\beta Q^{2}\mu_{b}^{2} (121)
+Œ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•gt‚àíQ‚Äã‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•2‚èü=‚Å£:Sb3+Lb‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãŒ≤22‚Äãn‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚à•g~it‚à•2‚èü=‚Å£:Sb4,ùúÇùõΩùîºsubscript‚èüsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptùëîùë°ùëÑ‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°2:absentsubscriptùëÜsubscriptùëè3subscriptùêøùëèsuperscriptùúÇ2superscriptùõΩ22ùëõùîºsubscript‚èüsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscript~ùëîùëñùë°2:absentsubscriptùëÜsubscriptùëè4\displaystyle+\eta\beta\,\mathbb{E}\underbrace{\left\lVert g^{t}-Q\nabla F^{(b)}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2}}_{=:S_{b_{3}}}+\frac{L_{b}\eta^{2}\beta^{2}}{2n}\mathbb{E}\underbrace{\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\left\lVert\tilde{g}_{i}^{t}\right\rVert^{2}}_{=:S_{b_{4}}}, (122)

where similar to (45)-(48), we can bound Sb3subscriptùëÜsubscriptùëè3S_{b_{3}} as follows:

Sb3‚â§Qn‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1‚à•‚àáFi(b)‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáFi(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•2.subscriptùëÜsubscriptùëè3ùëÑùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle S_{b_{3}}\leq\frac{Q}{n}\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q=0}^{Q{-}1}\left\lVert\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2}. (123)

Moreover, we can show an upper bound on Sb4subscriptùëÜsubscriptùëè4S_{b_{4}} akin to (124)-(127):

Sb4subscriptùëÜsubscriptùëè4\displaystyle S_{b_{4}} =‚àëi=1n‚à•‚àëq=0Q‚àí1‚àá~\displaystyle=\,\,\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\Big{\lVert}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\tilde{\nabla} Fi(b)(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚à•2\displaystyle F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2} (124)
‚â§Q‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1absentùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1\displaystyle{\leq}Q\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1} ‚à•‚àá~‚ÄãFi(b)‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚à•2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•~‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°2\displaystyle\Big{\lVert}\tilde{\nabla}F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2} (125)
=Q‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1absentùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1\displaystyle=\,\,\,Q\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1} ‚à•‚àá~Fi(b)(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáFi(b)(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))+‚àáFi(b)(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáFi(b)(wt)\displaystyle\Big{\lVert}\tilde{\nabla}F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)+\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w^{t}\right)
+‚àáFi(b)(wt)‚àí‚àáF(b)(wt)+‚àáF(b)(wt)‚à•2\displaystyle+\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w^{t}\right)-\nabla F^{(b)}\left(w^{t}\right)+\nabla F^{(b)}\left(w^{t}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2} (126)
‚â§4‚ÄãQ‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1absent4ùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1\displaystyle{\leq}4Q\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1} [‚à•‚àá~Fi(b)(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáFi(b)(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚à•2\displaystyle\Bigg{[}\Big{\lVert}\tilde{\nabla}F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}
+‚à•‚àáFi(b)‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáFi(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle+\Big{\lVert}\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w^{t}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}
+‚à•‚àáFi(b)‚Äã(wt)‚àí‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptùë§ùë°‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle+\Big{\lVert}\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w^{t}\right)-\nabla F^{(b)}\left(w^{t}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}
+‚à•‚àáF(b)(wt)‚à•2]‚áí\displaystyle+\Big{\lVert}\nabla F^{(b)}\left(w^{t}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}\Bigg{]}\Rightarrow (127)
ùîº‚Äã[Sb4]ùîºdelimited-[]subscriptùëÜsubscriptùëè4\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[S_{b_{4}}] ‚â§4‚ÄãQ‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1ùîºpi‚Äã[‚à•‚àá~‚ÄãFi(b)‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáFi(b)‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚à•2]absent4ùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1subscriptùîºsubscriptùëùùëñdelimited-[]superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•~‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°2\displaystyle{\leq}4Q\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\mathbb{E}_{p_{i}}\Bigg{[}\Big{\lVert}\tilde{\nabla}F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}\Bigg{]} (128)
+4‚ÄãQ‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáFi(b)‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáFi(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•24ùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle+4Q\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w^{t}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2} (129)
+4‚ÄãQ‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáFi(b)‚Äã(wt)‚àí‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•24ùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptùë§ùë°‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle+4Q\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w^{t}\right)-\nabla F^{(b)}\left(w^{t}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2} (130)
+4‚ÄãQ‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•24ùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle+4Q\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla F^{(b)}\left(w^{t}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2} (131)
‚â§4‚Äãn‚ÄãQ2‚Äã[œÉb2+Œ≥b2+ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•2]absent4ùëõsuperscriptùëÑ2delimited-[]superscriptsubscriptùúéùëè2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëè2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle{\leq}4nQ^{2}\left[\sigma_{b}^{2}+\gamma_{b}^{2}+\mathbb{E}\Big{\lVert}\nabla F^{(b)}\left(w^{t}\right)\Big{\rVert}^{2}\right] (132)
+4‚ÄãQ‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáFi(b)‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáFi(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•2.4ùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle+4Q\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2}. (133)

Therefore, due to (121)-(123) and (132)-(133), we have

ùîº‚ÄãF(b)‚Äã(wt+1)ùîºsuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°1\displaystyle\mathbb{E}F^{(b)}\left(w^{t{+}1}\right) ‚â§ùîº‚ÄãF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚àí[Œ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚Äã(2‚ÄãQ‚àí1)2‚àí2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãLb‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãQ2]‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•2absentùîºsuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°delimited-[]ùúÇùõΩ2ùëÑ122superscriptùúÇ2subscriptùêøùëèsuperscriptùõΩ2superscriptùëÑ2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}F^{(b)}(w^{t})-\left[\frac{\eta\beta(2Q{-}1)}{2}-2\eta^{2}L_{b}\beta^{2}Q^{2}\right]\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla F^{(b)}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2} (134)
+[Œ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãQn+2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãQ‚ÄãLbn]‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáFi(b)‚Äã(wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáFi(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•2delimited-[]ùúÇùõΩùëÑùëõ2superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùõΩ2ùëÑsubscriptùêøùëèùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle+\left[\frac{\eta\beta Q}{n}+\frac{2\eta^{2}\beta^{2}QL_{b}}{n}\right]\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2} (135)
+Œ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãQ2‚ÄãŒºb2+2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãLb‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãQ2‚ÄãœÉb2+2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãLb‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãQ2‚ÄãŒ≥b2ùúÇùõΩsuperscriptùëÑ2superscriptsubscriptùúáùëè22superscriptùúÇ2subscriptùêøùëèsuperscriptùõΩ2superscriptùëÑ2superscriptsubscriptùúéùëè22superscriptùúÇ2subscriptùêøùëèsuperscriptùõΩ2superscriptùëÑ2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëè2\displaystyle+\eta\beta Q^{2}\mu_{b}^{2}+2\eta^{2}L_{b}\beta^{2}Q^{2}\sigma_{b}^{2}+2\eta^{2}L_{b}\beta^{2}Q^{2}\gamma_{b}^{2} (136)
‚â§ùîº‚ÄãF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚àí[Œ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚Äã(2‚ÄãQ‚àí1)2‚àí2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãLb‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãQ2]‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•2absentùîºsuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°delimited-[]ùúÇùõΩ2ùëÑ122superscriptùúÇ2subscriptùêøùëèsuperscriptùõΩ2superscriptùëÑ2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle{\leq}\mathbb{E}F^{(b)}(w^{t})-\left[\frac{\eta\beta(2Q{-}1)}{2}-2\eta^{2}L_{b}\beta^{2}Q^{2}\right]\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla F^{(b)}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2} (137)
+Œ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãQ‚ÄãLb2‚Äã(1+2‚ÄãŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãLb)n‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1ùîº‚Äã‚à•wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t)‚àíwt‚à•2‚èü=‚Å£:Sb5ùúÇùõΩùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùêøùëè212ùúÇùõΩsubscriptùêøùëèùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1ùîºsubscript‚èüsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°superscriptùë§ùë°2:absentsubscriptùëÜsubscriptùëè5\displaystyle+\frac{\eta\beta QL_{b}^{2}\left(1{+}2\eta\beta L_{b}\right)}{n}\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\mathbb{E}\underbrace{\left\lVert w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}-w^{t}\right\rVert^{2}}_{=:S_{b_{5}}} (138)
+Œ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãQ2‚ÄãŒºb2+2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãLb‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãQ2‚Äã(œÉb2+Œ≥b2).ùúÇùõΩsuperscriptùëÑ2superscriptsubscriptùúáùëè22superscriptùúÇ2subscriptùêøùëèsuperscriptùõΩ2superscriptùëÑ2superscriptsubscriptùúéùëè2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëè2\displaystyle+\eta\beta Q^{2}\mu_{b}^{2}+2\eta^{2}L_{b}\beta^{2}Q^{2}\left(\sigma_{b}^{2}+\gamma_{b}^{2}\right). (139)

Now, we provide an upper bound on Sb5subscriptùëÜsubscriptùëè5S_{b_{5}} in (137) as follows:

Sb5=‚à•wt‚àíwi,qŒ©‚Äã(t)‚à•2subscriptùëÜsubscriptùëè5superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptùë§ùë°superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°2\displaystyle S_{b_{5}}=\left\lVert w^{t}-w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right\rVert^{2} =‚à•wt‚àíwŒ©‚Äã(t)+wŒ©‚Äã(t)‚àíwi,qŒ©‚Äã(t)‚à•2absentsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptùë§ùë°superscriptùë§Œ©ùë°superscriptùë§Œ©ùë°superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°2\displaystyle=\left\lVert w^{t}-w^{\Omega(t)}+w^{\Omega(t)}-w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right\rVert^{2} (140)
‚â§2‚Äã‚à•wŒ©‚Äã(t)‚àíwi,qŒ©‚Äã(t)‚à•2‚èüSb6+2‚Äã‚à•wt‚àíwŒ©‚Äã(t)‚à•2‚èüSb7,absent2subscript‚èüsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptùë§Œ©ùë°superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°2subscriptùëÜsubscriptùëè62subscript‚èüsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptùë§ùë°superscriptùë§Œ©ùë°2subscriptùëÜsubscriptùëè7\displaystyle{\leq}2\underbrace{\left\lVert w^{\Omega(t)}-w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right\rVert^{2}}_{S_{b_{6}}}+2\underbrace{\left\lVert w^{t}-w^{\Omega(t)}\right\rVert^{2}}_{S_{b_{7}}}, (141)

where the first term determines the evolution of local updates and the second term considers the effect of asynchronous updates. Therefore, using Lemma 4, we have

ùîº‚Äã[Sb6]ùîºdelimited-[]subscriptùëÜsubscriptùëè6\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[S_{b_{6}}] =ùîº‚Äã‚à•wŒ©‚Äã(t)‚àíwi,qŒ©‚Äã(t)‚à•2absentùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptùë§Œ©ùë°superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°2\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\left\lVert w^{\Omega(t)}-w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right\rVert^{2} (142)
=ùîº‚Äã‚à•wi,0Œ©‚Äã(t)‚àíwi,qŒ©‚Äã(t)‚à•2absentùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñ0Œ©ùë°superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°2\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\left\lVert w_{i,0}^{\Omega(t)}-w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}\right\rVert^{2} (143)
=Œ∑2‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àër=0q‚àí1‚àá~‚ÄãFi(b)‚Äã(wi,rŒ©‚Äã(t))‚à•2absentsuperscriptùúÇ2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùëü0ùëû1~‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëüŒ©ùë°2\displaystyle{=}\eta^{2}\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\sum_{r{=}0}^{q{-}1}\tilde{\nabla}F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,r}^{\Omega(t)}\right)\right\rVert^{2} (144)
‚â§Œ∑2‚Äãq‚Äã‚àër=0q‚àí1ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àá~‚ÄãFi(b)‚Äã(wi,rŒ©‚Äã(t))‚à•2absentsuperscriptùúÇ2ùëûsuperscriptsubscriptùëü0ùëû1ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•~‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëüŒ©ùë°2\displaystyle{\leq}\eta^{2}q\sum_{r{=}0}^{q{-}1}\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\tilde{\nabla}F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,r}^{\Omega(t)}\right)\right\rVert^{2} (145)
‚â§2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚Äãq‚Äã‚àër=0q‚àí1[ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àá~‚ÄãFi(b)‚Äã(wi,rŒ©‚Äã(t))‚àí‚àáFi(b)‚Äã(wi,rŒ©‚Äã(t))‚à•2+ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáFi(b)‚Äã(wi,rŒ©‚Äã(t))‚à•2]absent2superscriptùúÇ2ùëûsuperscriptsubscriptùëü0ùëû1delimited-[]ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•~‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëüŒ©ùë°‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëüŒ©ùë°2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèùëñsuperscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëüŒ©ùë°2\displaystyle{\leq}2\eta^{2}q\sum_{r{=}0}^{q{-}1}\left[\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\tilde{\nabla}F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,r}^{\Omega(t)}\right)-\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,r}^{\Omega(t)}\right)\right\rVert^{2}+\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla F^{(b)}_{i}\left(w_{i,r}^{\Omega(t)}\right)\right\rVert^{2}\right] (146)
‚â§2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚Äãq‚Äã‚àër=0q‚àí1(Gb2+œÉb2)=2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚Äãq2‚Äã(Gb2+œÉb2),absent2superscriptùúÇ2ùëûsuperscriptsubscriptùëü0ùëû1superscriptsubscriptùê∫ùëè2superscriptsubscriptùúéùëè22superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùëû2superscriptsubscriptùê∫ùëè2superscriptsubscriptùúéùëè2\displaystyle{\leq}2\eta^{2}q\sum_{r{=}0}^{q{-}1}\left(G_{b}^{2}+\sigma_{b}^{2}\right)=2\eta^{2}q^{2}\left(G_{b}^{2}+\sigma_{b}^{2}\right), (147)
ùîº‚Äã[Sb7]ùîºdelimited-[]subscriptùëÜsubscriptùëè7\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[S_{b_{7}}] =ùîº‚Äã‚à•wt‚àíwŒ©‚Äã(t)‚à•2absentùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptùë§ùë°superscriptùë§Œ©ùë°2\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\left\lVert w^{t}-w^{\Omega(t)}\right\rVert^{2} (148)
=ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àës=Œ©‚Äã(t)t‚àí1(ws+1‚àíws)‚à•2absentùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùë†Œ©ùë°ùë°1superscriptùë§ùë†1superscriptùë§ùë†2\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\sum_{s{=}\Omega(t)}^{t{-}1}\left(w^{s{+}1}-w^{s}\right)\right\rVert^{2} (149)
=Œ∑2‚ÄãŒ≤2‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àës=Œ©‚Äã(t)t‚àí1‚àëq=0Q‚àí1‚àá~‚ÄãFis(b)‚Äã(wis,qŒ©‚Äã(s))‚à•2absentsuperscriptùúÇ2superscriptùõΩ2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùë†Œ©ùë°ùë°1superscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1~‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèsubscriptùëñùë†superscriptsubscriptùë§subscriptùëñùë†ùëûŒ©ùë†2\displaystyle{=}\eta^{2}\beta^{2}\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\sum_{s{=}\Omega(t)}^{t{-}1}\sum_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\tilde{\nabla}F^{(b)}_{i_{s}}\left(w_{{i_{s}},q}^{\Omega(s)}\right)\right\rVert^{2} (150)
‚â§Œ∑2‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãQ‚Äã(t‚àíŒ©‚Äã(t))‚Äã‚àës=Œ©‚Äã(t)t‚àí1‚àëq=0Q‚àí1ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àá~‚ÄãFis(b)‚Äã(wis,qŒ©‚Äã(s))‚à•2absentsuperscriptùúÇ2superscriptùõΩ2ùëÑùë°Œ©ùë°superscriptsubscriptùë†Œ©ùë°ùë°1superscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•~‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëèsubscriptùëñùë†superscriptsubscriptùë§subscriptùëñùë†ùëûŒ©ùë†2\displaystyle{\leq}\eta^{2}\beta^{2}Q\,(t{-}\Omega(t))\sum_{s{=}\Omega(t)}^{t{-}1}\sum_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\tilde{\nabla}F^{(b)}_{i_{s}}\left(w_{{i_{s}},q}^{\Omega(s)}\right)\right\rVert^{2} (151)
‚â§2Œ∑2Œ≤2QœÑ‚àës=t‚àíœÑt‚àí1‚àëq=0Q‚àí1[ùîº‚à•‚àá~Fis(b)(wis,qŒ©‚Äã(s))‚àí‚àáFis(b)(wis,qŒ©‚Äã(s))‚à•2\displaystyle{\leq}2\eta^{2}\beta^{2}Q\,\tau\sum_{s{=}t{-}\tau}^{t{-}1}\sum_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\Bigg{[}\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\tilde{\nabla}F^{(b)}_{i_{s}}\left(w_{{i_{s}},q}^{\Omega(s)}\right)-\nabla F^{(b)}_{i_{s}}\left(w_{{i_{s}},q}^{\Omega(s)}\right)\right\rVert^{2}
+ùîº‚à•‚àáFis(b)(wis,qŒ©‚Äã(s))‚à•2]\displaystyle\qquad\qquad\qquad\qquad\quad\,\,\,+\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla F^{(b)}_{i_{s}}\left(w_{{i_{s}},q}^{\Omega(s)}\right)\right\rVert^{2}\Bigg{]} (152)
‚â§2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãQ‚ÄãœÑ2‚Äã‚àëq=0Q‚àí1(Gb2+œÉb2)=2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãQ2‚ÄãœÑ2‚Äã(Gb2+œÉb2).absent2superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùõΩ2ùëÑsuperscriptùúè2superscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1superscriptsubscriptùê∫ùëè2superscriptsubscriptùúéùëè22superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùõΩ2superscriptùëÑ2superscriptùúè2superscriptsubscriptùê∫ùëè2superscriptsubscriptùúéùëè2\displaystyle{\leq}2\eta^{2}\beta^{2}Q\tau^{2}\sum_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\left(G_{b}^{2}+\sigma_{b}^{2}\right)=2\eta^{2}\beta^{2}Q^{2}\tau^{2}\left(G_{b}^{2}+\sigma_{b}^{2}\right). (153)

So, according to (134)-(153),

ùîº‚ÄãF(b)‚Äã(wt+1)ùîºsuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°1\displaystyle\mathbb{E}F^{(b)}\left(w^{t{+}1}\right) ‚â§ùîº‚ÄãF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚àíŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤2‚Äã(2‚ÄãQ‚àí1‚àí4‚ÄãŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãLb‚ÄãQ2)‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•2absentùîºsuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°ùúÇùõΩ22ùëÑ14ùúÇùõΩsubscriptùêøùëèsuperscriptùëÑ2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}F^{(b)}(w^{t})-\frac{\eta\beta}{2}\left(2Q{-}1-4\eta\beta L_{b}Q^{2}\right)\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla F^{(b)}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2} (154)
+4‚ÄãŒ∑3‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãQ4‚ÄãLb2‚Äã(1+2‚ÄãŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãLb‚ÄãQ)‚Äã(Gb2+œÉb2)‚Äã(Œ≤2‚ÄãœÑ2+1)4superscriptùúÇ3ùõΩsuperscriptùëÑ4superscriptsubscriptùêøùëè212ùúÇùõΩsubscriptùêøùëèùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùê∫ùëè2superscriptsubscriptùúéùëè2superscriptùõΩ2superscriptùúè21\displaystyle+4\eta^{3}\beta Q^{4}L_{b}^{2}\left(1{+}2\eta\beta L_{b}Q\right)\left(G_{b}^{2}{+}\sigma_{b}^{2}\right)\left(\beta^{2}\tau^{2}{+}1\right) (155)
+Œ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãQ2‚ÄãŒºb2+2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãLb‚ÄãQ2‚ÄãœÉb2+2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãLb‚ÄãQ2‚ÄãŒ≥b2,ùúÇùõΩsuperscriptùëÑ2superscriptsubscriptùúáùëè22superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùõΩ2subscriptùêøùëèsuperscriptùëÑ2superscriptsubscriptùúéùëè22superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùõΩ2subscriptùêøùëèsuperscriptùëÑ2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëè2\displaystyle+\eta\beta Q^{2}\mu_{b}^{2}+2\eta^{2}\beta^{2}L_{b}Q^{2}\sigma_{b}^{2}+2\eta^{2}\beta^{2}L_{b}Q^{2}\gamma_{b}^{2}, (156)

where by adding the terms in (154)-(156), for t=0,1,‚Ä¶‚ÄãT‚àí1ùë°01‚Ä¶ùëá1t=0,1,\dots T{-}1, and rearranging them, we obtain the following inequality:

1‚àí4‚ÄãŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãLb‚ÄãQT‚Äã‚àët=0T‚àí1ùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáF(b)‚Äã(wt)‚à•214ùúÇùõΩsubscriptùêøùëèùëÑùëásuperscriptsubscriptùë°0ùëá1ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle\frac{1-4\eta\beta L_{b}Q}{T}\sum\limits_{t=0}^{T{-}1}\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla F^{(b)}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2} ‚â§2‚Äã(F(b)‚Äã(w0)‚àíùîº‚ÄãF(b)‚Äã(wT))Œ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãQ‚ÄãTabsent2superscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§0ùîºsuperscriptùêπùëèsuperscriptùë§ùëáùúÇùõΩùëÑùëá\displaystyle\leq\frac{2\left(F^{(b)}(w^{0})-\mathbb{E}F^{(b)}(w^{T})\right)}{\eta\beta QT} (157)
+8‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãQ3‚ÄãLb2‚Äã(1+2‚ÄãŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãLb‚ÄãQ)‚Äã(Gb2+œÉb2)‚Äã(Œ≤2‚ÄãœÑ2+1)8superscriptùúÇ2superscriptùëÑ3superscriptsubscriptùêøùëè212ùúÇùõΩsubscriptùêøùëèùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùê∫ùëè2superscriptsubscriptùúéùëè2superscriptùõΩ2superscriptùúè21\displaystyle+8\eta^{2}Q^{3}L_{b}^{2}\left(1{+}2\eta\beta L_{b}Q\right)\left(G_{b}^{2}{+}\sigma_{b}^{2}\right)\left(\beta^{2}\tau^{2}{+}1\right) (158)
+4‚ÄãŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãLb‚ÄãQ‚Äã(œÉb2+Œ≥b2)4ùúÇùõΩsubscriptùêøùëèùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùúéùëè2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëè2\displaystyle+4\eta\beta L_{b}Q\left(\sigma_{b}^{2}+\gamma_{b}^{2}\right) (159)
+2‚ÄãQ‚ÄãŒºb2.2ùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùúáùëè2\displaystyle+2Q\mu_{b}^{2}. (160)

Finally, we can conclude the proof by fixing Œ≤=1ùõΩ1\beta=1 and Œ∑‚âî1Q‚ÄãLb‚ÄãT‚âîùúÇ1ùëÑsubscriptùêøùëèùëá\eta\coloneqq\frac{1}{Q\sqrt{L_{b}T}} for T‚â•64‚ÄãLbùëá64subscriptùêøùëèT\geq 64L_{b}, hence Œ∑‚â§18‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãLb‚ÄãQùúÇ18ùõΩsubscriptùêøùëèùëÑ\eta\leq\frac{1}{8\beta L_{b}Q}. ‚àé

Appendix C Personalized Asynchronous Federated Learning: ME

We start by showing (10). According to the definitions in (6) and (8), we have

Œ∏^i‚Äã(w)subscript^ùúÉùëñùë§\displaystyle\hat{\theta}_{i}(w) =arg‚ÄãminŒ∏i‚àà‚Ñùd‚Å°[fi‚Äã(Œ∏i)+Œª2‚Äã‚ÄñŒ∏i‚àíw‚Äñ2]‚áí‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))+Œª‚Äã[Œ∏^i‚Äã(w)‚àíw]=0,absentsubscriptargminsubscriptùúÉùëñsuperscript‚ÑùùëësubscriptùëìùëñsubscriptùúÉùëñùúÜ2superscriptnormsubscriptùúÉùëñùë§2‚áí‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§ùúÜdelimited-[]subscript^ùúÉùëñùë§ùë§0\displaystyle=\operatorname*{arg\,min}_{\theta_{i}\in\mathbb{R}^{d}}\left[f_{i}(\theta_{i})+\frac{\lambda}{2}{\left\|\theta_{i}-w\right\|}^{2}\right]\Rightarrow\nabla f_{i}\left(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)\right)+\lambda\left[\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)-w\right]=0, (161)
Fi(c)‚Äã(w)subscriptsuperscriptùêπùëêùëñùë§\displaystyle F^{(c)}_{i}(w) =fi‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))+Œª2‚Äã‚à•Œ∏^i‚Äã(w)‚àíw‚à•2,absentsubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§ùúÜ2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscript^ùúÉùëñùë§ùë§2\displaystyle=f_{i}\left(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)\right)+\frac{\lambda}{2}\left\lVert\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)-w\right\rVert^{2}, (162)

therefore,

‚àáFi(c)‚Äã(w)‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëêùëñùë§\displaystyle\nabla F^{(c)}_{i}(w) =‚àÇŒ∏^i‚Äã(w)‚àÇw‚Äã[‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))]+Œª‚Äã[‚àÇŒ∏^i‚Äã(w)‚àÇw‚àíI]‚Äã[Œ∏^i‚Äã(w)‚àíw]absentsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§ùë§delimited-[]‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§ùúÜdelimited-[]subscript^ùúÉùëñùë§ùë§ùêºdelimited-[]subscript^ùúÉùëñùë§ùë§\displaystyle{=}\frac{\partial\,\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)}{\partial w}\left[\nabla f_{i}\left(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)\right)\right]+\lambda\left[\frac{\partial\,\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)}{\partial w}-I\right]\left[\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)-w\right] (163)
=Œª‚Äã‚àÇŒ∏^i‚Äã(w)‚àÇw‚Äã[w‚àíŒ∏^i‚Äã(w)]+Œª‚Äã[‚àÇŒ∏^i‚Äã(w)‚àÇw‚àíI]‚Äã[Œ∏^i‚Äã(w)‚àíw]absentùúÜsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§ùë§delimited-[]ùë§subscript^ùúÉùëñùë§ùúÜdelimited-[]subscript^ùúÉùëñùë§ùë§ùêºdelimited-[]subscript^ùúÉùëñùë§ùë§\displaystyle{=}\lambda\frac{\partial\,\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)}{\partial w}\left[w-\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)\right]+\lambda\left[\frac{\partial\,\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)}{\partial w}-I\right]\left[\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)-w\right] (164)
=Œª‚Äã[w‚àíŒ∏^i‚Äã(w)].absentùúÜdelimited-[]ùë§subscript^ùúÉùëñùë§\displaystyle=\lambda\left[w-\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)\right]. (165)

Before, presenting the proof of Theorem 3, we proceed by providing the proof of Lemmas 5, 6, and 7.

Proof of Lemma 5.

Let w,vùë§ùë£w,v be two arbitrary vectors in ‚Ñùdsuperscript‚Ñùùëë\mathbb{R}^{d}. Then, we have:

‚àáFi(c)‚Äã(w)‚àí‚àáFi(c)‚Äã(y)‚àásuperscriptsubscriptùêπùëñùëêùë§‚àásuperscriptsubscriptùêπùëñùëêùë¶\displaystyle\nabla F_{i}^{(c)}(w)-\nabla F_{i}^{(c)}(y) =Œª‚Äã[w‚àíŒ∏^i‚Äã(w)]‚àíŒª‚Äã[v‚àíŒ∏^i‚Äã(v)]absentùúÜdelimited-[]ùë§subscript^ùúÉùëñùë§ùúÜdelimited-[]ùë£subscript^ùúÉùëñùë£\displaystyle{=}\lambda\left[w-\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)\right]-\lambda\left[v-\hat{\theta}_{i}(v)\right] (166)
=‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))‚àí‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(v))‚áíabsent‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë£‚áíabsent\displaystyle{=}\nabla f_{i}\left(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)\right)-\nabla f_{i}\left(\hat{\theta}_{i}(v)\right)\Rightarrow (167)
‚à•‚àáFi(c)‚Äã(w)‚àí‚àáFi(c)‚Äã(y)‚à•delimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásuperscriptsubscriptùêπùëñùëêùë§‚àásuperscriptsubscriptùêπùëñùëêùë¶\displaystyle\left\lVert\nabla F_{i}^{(c)}(w)-\nabla F_{i}^{(c)}(y)\right\rVert =‚à•‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))‚àí‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(v))‚à•absentdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë£\displaystyle=\left\lVert\nabla f_{i}\left(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)\right)-\nabla f_{i}\left(\hat{\theta}_{i}(v)\right)\right\rVert (168)
‚â§L‚Äã‚à•Œ∏^i‚Äã(w)‚àíŒ∏^i‚Äã(v)‚à•absentùêødelimited-‚à•‚à•subscript^ùúÉùëñùë§subscript^ùúÉùëñùë£\displaystyle{\leq}L\left\lVert\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)-\hat{\theta}_{i}(v)\right\rVert (169)
=L‚Äã‚à•w‚àí1Œª‚Äã‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))‚àív+1Œª‚Äã‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(v))‚à•absentùêødelimited-‚à•‚à•ùë§1ùúÜ‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§ùë£1ùúÜ‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë£\displaystyle{=}L\left\lVert w-\frac{1}{\lambda}\nabla f_{i}\left(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)\right)-v+\frac{1}{\lambda}\nabla f_{i}\left(\hat{\theta}_{i}(v)\right)\right\rVert (170)
‚â§L‚Äã‚à•w‚àív‚à•+LŒª‚Äã‚à•‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))‚àí‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(v))‚à•absentùêødelimited-‚à•‚à•ùë§ùë£ùêøùúÜdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë£\displaystyle\leq L\left\lVert w-v\right\rVert+\frac{L}{\lambda}\left\lVert\nabla f_{i}\left(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)\right)-\nabla f_{i}\left(\hat{\theta}_{i}(v)\right)\right\rVert (171)
=L‚Äã‚à•w‚àív‚à•+LŒª‚Äã‚à•‚àáFi(c)‚Äã(w)‚àí‚àáFi(c)‚Äã(y)‚à•‚áíabsentùêødelimited-‚à•‚à•ùë§ùë£ùêøùúÜdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásuperscriptsubscriptùêπùëñùëêùë§‚àásuperscriptsubscriptùêπùëñùëêùë¶‚áíabsent\displaystyle=L\left\lVert w-v\right\rVert+\frac{L}{\lambda}\left\lVert\nabla F_{i}^{(c)}(w)-\nabla F_{i}^{(c)}(y)\right\rVert\Rightarrow (172)
‚à•‚àáFi(c)‚Äã(w)‚àí‚àáFi(c)‚Äã(y)‚à•delimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásuperscriptsubscriptùêπùëñùëêùë§‚àásuperscriptsubscriptùêπùëñùëêùë¶\displaystyle\left\lVert\nabla F_{i}^{(c)}(w)-\nabla F_{i}^{(c)}(y)\right\rVert ‚â§Œª‚ÄãLŒª‚àíL‚Äã‚à•w‚àív‚à•,absentùúÜùêøùúÜùêødelimited-‚à•‚à•ùë§ùë£\displaystyle\leq\frac{\lambda L}{\lambda-L}\left\lVert w-v\right\rVert, (173)

which means Fi(c)subscriptsuperscriptùêπùëêùëñF^{(c)}_{i} is Œª‚ÄãLŒª‚àíLùúÜùêøùúÜùêø\frac{\lambda L}{\lambda-L}-smooth. Note that for Œª‚â•Œ∫‚ÄãLùúÜùúÖùêø\lambda\geq\kappa L, for some Œ∫>1ùúÖ1\kappa>1,

Œª‚ÄãLŒª‚àíL‚â§Lc‚âîŒªŒ∫‚àí1ùúÜùêøùúÜùêøsubscriptùêøùëê‚âîùúÜùúÖ1\displaystyle\frac{\lambda L}{\lambda-L}\leq L_{c}\coloneqq\frac{\lambda}{\kappa-1} (174)

This concludes the statement of Lemma 5. ‚àé

Proof of Lemma 6.

According to Step 14 of Algorithm 2, let us introduce full and stochastic auxiliary cost functions hi‚Äã(‚ãÖ)subscript‚Ñéùëñ‚ãÖh_{i}(\cdot) and h~i‚Äã(‚ãÖ)subscript~‚Ñéùëñ‚ãÖ\tilde{h}_{i}(\cdot) as follows:

hi‚Äã(Œ∏i,w)subscript‚ÑéùëñsubscriptùúÉùëñùë§\displaystyle h_{i}(\theta_{i},w) =fi‚Äã(Œ∏i)+Œª2‚Äã‚à•Œ∏i‚àíw‚à•2,absentsubscriptùëìùëñsubscriptùúÉùëñùúÜ2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptùúÉùëñùë§2\displaystyle=f_{i}(\theta_{i})+\frac{\lambda}{2}\left\lVert\theta_{i}-w\right\rVert^{2}, (175)
h~i‚Äã(Œ∏i,w,ùíü)subscript~‚ÑéùëñsubscriptùúÉùëñùë§ùíü\displaystyle\tilde{h}_{i}(\theta_{i},w,\mathcal{D}) =f~i‚Äã(Œ∏i,ùíü)+Œª2‚Äã‚à•Œ∏i‚àíw‚à•2,absentsubscript~ùëìùëñsubscriptùúÉùëñùíüùúÜ2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptùúÉùëñùë§2\displaystyle=\tilde{f}_{i}(\theta_{i},\mathcal{D})+\frac{\lambda}{2}\left\lVert\theta_{i}-w\right\rVert^{2}, (176)

where due to (175), we have

‚àáh~i‚Äã(Œ∏~i‚Äã(w),w,ùíü)‚àásubscript~‚Ñéùëñsubscript~ùúÉùëñùë§ùë§ùíü\displaystyle\nabla\tilde{h}_{i}(\tilde{\theta}_{i}(w),w,\mathcal{D}) =‚àáf~i‚Äã(Œ∏~i‚Äã(w),ùíü)+Œª‚Äã[Œ∏~i‚Äã(w)‚àíw],absent‚àásubscript~ùëìùëñsubscript~ùúÉùëñùë§ùíüùúÜdelimited-[]subscript~ùúÉùëñùë§ùë§\displaystyle=\nabla\tilde{f}_{i}(\tilde{\theta}_{i}(w),\mathcal{D})+\lambda\left[\tilde{\theta}_{i}(w)-w\right], (177)

hence, we can show (26) as follows:

‚à•ùîºpi[‚àáF~i(c)\displaystyle\Big{\lVert}\mathbb{E}_{p_{i}}\Big{[}\nabla\tilde{F}^{(c)}_{i} (w,ùíü)‚àí‚àáFi(c)(w)]‚à•\displaystyle(w,\mathcal{D})-\nabla F^{(c)}_{i}(w)\Big{]}\Big{\rVert} (178)
=‚à•ùîºpi‚Äã[Œª‚ÄãŒ∏^i‚Äã(w)‚àíŒª‚ÄãŒ∏~i‚Äã(w)]‚à•absentdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptùîºsubscriptùëùùëñdelimited-[]ùúÜsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§ùúÜsubscript~ùúÉùëñùë§\displaystyle{=}\left\lVert\mathbb{E}_{p_{i}}\big{[}\lambda\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)-\lambda\tilde{\theta}_{i}(w)\big{]}\right\rVert (179)
=‚à•ùîºpi‚Äã[‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))‚àí‚àáf~i‚Äã(Œ∏~i‚Äã(w),ùíü)+‚àáh~i‚Äã(Œ∏~i‚Äã(w),w,ùíü)]‚à•absentdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptùîºsubscriptùëùùëñdelimited-[]‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§‚àásubscript~ùëìùëñsubscript~ùúÉùëñùë§ùíü‚àásubscript~‚Ñéùëñsubscript~ùúÉùëñùë§ùë§ùíü\displaystyle{=}\Big{\lVert}\mathbb{E}_{p_{i}}\big{[}\nabla f_{i}(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))-\nabla\tilde{f}_{i}(\tilde{\theta}_{i}(w),\mathcal{D})+\nabla\tilde{h}_{i}(\tilde{\theta}_{i}(w),w,\mathcal{D})\big{]}\Big{\rVert} (180)
=‚à•ùîºpi‚Äã[‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))‚àí‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏~i‚Äã(w))]+ùîºpi‚Äã[‚àáh~i‚Äã(Œ∏~i‚Äã(w),w,ùíü)]‚à•absentdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptùîºsubscriptùëùùëñdelimited-[]‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript~ùúÉùëñùë§subscriptùîºsubscriptùëùùëñdelimited-[]‚àásubscript~‚Ñéùëñsubscript~ùúÉùëñùë§ùë§ùíü\displaystyle=\Big{\lVert}\mathbb{E}_{p_{i}}\big{[}\nabla f_{i}(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))-\nabla f_{i}(\tilde{\theta}_{i}(w))\big{]}+\mathbb{E}_{p_{i}}\big{[}\nabla\tilde{h}_{i}(\tilde{\theta}_{i}(w),w,\mathcal{D})\big{]}\Big{\rVert} (181)
‚â§‚à•ùîºpi‚Äã[‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))‚àí‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏~i‚Äã(w))]‚à•+ŒΩabsentdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptùîºsubscriptùëùùëñdelimited-[]‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript~ùúÉùëñùë§ùúà\displaystyle\leq\Big{\lVert}\mathbb{E}_{p_{i}}\big{[}\nabla f_{i}(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))-\nabla f_{i}(\tilde{\theta}_{i}(w))\big{]}\Big{\rVert}+\nu (182)
‚â§L‚Äã‚à•ùîºpi‚Äã[Œ∏^i‚Äã(w)‚àíŒ∏~i‚Äã(w)]‚à•+ŒΩabsentùêødelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptùîºsubscriptùëùùëñdelimited-[]subscript^ùúÉùëñùë§subscript~ùúÉùëñùë§ùúà\displaystyle{\leq}L\Big{\lVert}\mathbb{E}_{p_{i}}\big{[}\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)-\tilde{\theta}_{i}(w)\big{]}\Big{\rVert}+\nu (183)
=LŒª‚Äã‚à•ùîºpi‚Äã[‚àáF~i(c)‚Äã(w,ùíü)‚àí‚àáFi(c)‚Äã(w)]‚à•+ŒΩ‚áíabsentùêøùúÜdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscriptùîºsubscriptùëùùëñdelimited-[]‚àásubscriptsuperscript~ùêπùëêùëñùë§ùíü‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëêùëñùë§ùúà‚áíabsent\displaystyle{=}\frac{L}{\lambda}\left\lVert\mathbb{E}_{p_{i}}\left[\nabla\tilde{F}^{(c)}_{i}(w,\mathcal{D})-\nabla F^{(c)}_{i}(w)\right]\right\rVert+\nu\Rightarrow (184)
‚à•ùîºpi[‚àáF~i(c)\displaystyle\Big{\lVert}\mathbb{E}_{p_{i}}\Big{[}\nabla\tilde{F}^{(c)}_{i} (w,ùíü)‚àí‚àáFi(c)(w)]‚à•‚â§ŒªŒª‚àíLŒΩ.\displaystyle(w,\mathcal{D})-\nabla F^{(c)}_{i}(w)\Big{]}\Big{\rVert}\leq\frac{\lambda}{\lambda-L}\nu. (185)

You can find the proof of (27) in [13][Appendix A.2]. ‚àé

Proof of Lemma 7.

First, note that we have

1n‚àëi=1n‚à•‚àáFi(c)(w)‚àí‚àá\displaystyle\frac{1}{n}\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\Big{\lVert}\nabla F^{(c)}_{i}(w)-\nabla F(c)(w)‚à•2\displaystyle F^{(c)}(w)\Big{\rVert}^{2} (186)
=1n‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚à•Œª‚Äã(w‚àíŒ∏^i‚Äã(w))‚àí1n‚Äã‚àëj=1nŒª‚Äã(w‚àíŒ∏^i‚Äã(w))‚à•2absent1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•ùúÜùë§subscript^ùúÉùëñùë§1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëó1ùëõùúÜùë§subscript^ùúÉùëñùë§2\displaystyle{=}\frac{1}{n}\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\left\lVert\lambda(w-\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))-\frac{1}{n}\sum_{j=1}^{n}\lambda(w-\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))\right\rVert^{2} (187)
=1n3‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚à•‚àëj=1n[‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))‚àí‚àáfj‚Äã(Œ∏^j‚Äã(w))]‚à•2absent1superscriptùëõ3superscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùëó1ùëõdelimited-[]‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§‚àásubscriptùëìùëósubscript^ùúÉùëóùë§2\displaystyle{=}\frac{1}{n^{3}}\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\left\lVert\sum\limits_{j=1}^{n}\left[\nabla f_{i}(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))-\nabla f_{j}(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))\right]\right\rVert^{2} (188)
‚â§1n2‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëj=1n‚à•‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))‚àí‚àáfj‚Äã(Œ∏^j‚Äã(w))‚à•2.absent1superscriptùëõ2superscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëó1ùëõsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§‚àásubscriptùëìùëósubscript^ùúÉùëóùë§2\displaystyle{\leq}\frac{1}{n^{2}}\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{j=1}^{n}\left\lVert\nabla f_{i}(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))-\nabla f_{j}(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))\right\rVert^{2}. (189)

So, we simplify the upper bound as follows:

‚à•‚àáfi(Œ∏^i(w))‚àí‚àá\displaystyle\Big{\lVert}\nabla f_{i}(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))-\nabla fj(Œ∏^j(w))‚à•2\displaystyle f_{j}(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))\Big{\rVert}^{2} (190)
=‚à•‚àáfi(Œ∏^i(w))‚àí‚àáfi(Œ∏^j(w))+‚àáfi(Œ∏^j(w))‚àí‚àáf(Œ∏^j(w))\displaystyle=\Big{\lVert}\nabla f_{i}(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))-\nabla f_{i}(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))+\nabla f_{i}(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))-\nabla f(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))
+‚àáf‚Äã(Œ∏^j‚Äã(w))‚àí‚àáf‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))+‚àáf‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))‚àí‚àáfj‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))‚àáùëìsubscript^ùúÉùëóùë§‚àáùëìsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§‚àáùëìsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§‚àásubscriptùëìùëósubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§\displaystyle\quad+\nabla f(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))-\nabla f(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))+\nabla f(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))-\nabla f_{j}(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))
+‚àáfj(Œ∏^i(w))‚àí‚àáfj(Œ∏^j(w))‚à•2\displaystyle\quad+\nabla f_{j}(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))-\nabla f_{j}(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))\Big{\rVert}^{2} (191)
‚â§43‚à•‚àáfi(Œ∏^i(w))‚àí‚àáfi(Œ∏^j(w))+‚àáf(Œ∏^j(w))‚àí‚àáf(Œ∏^i(w))\displaystyle{\leq}\frac{4}{3}\Big{\lVert}\nabla f_{i}(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))-\nabla f_{i}(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))+\nabla f(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))-\nabla f(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))
+‚àáfj(Œ∏^i(w))‚àí‚àáfj(Œ∏^j(w))‚à•2\displaystyle\qquad\quad+\nabla f_{j}(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))-\nabla f_{j}(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))\Big{\rVert}^{2} (192)
+4‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))‚àí‚àáfj‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))+‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏^j‚Äã(w))‚àí‚àáf‚Äã(Œ∏^j‚Äã(w))‚à•24superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§‚àásubscriptùëìùëósubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëóùë§‚àáùëìsubscript^ùúÉùëóùë§2\displaystyle+4\Big{\lVert}\nabla f(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))-\nabla f_{j}(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))+\nabla f_{i}(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))-\nabla f(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))\Big{\rVert}^{2} (193)
‚â§4‚Äã‚à•‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))‚àí‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏^j‚Äã(w))‚à•2absent4superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëóùë§2\displaystyle{\leq}4\Big{\lVert}\nabla f_{i}(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))-\nabla f_{i}(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))\Big{\rVert}^{2} (194)
+4‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(Œ∏^j‚Äã(w))‚àí‚àáf‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))‚à•24superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsubscript^ùúÉùëóùë§‚àáùëìsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§2\displaystyle+4\Big{\lVert}\nabla f(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))-\nabla f(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))\Big{\rVert}^{2} (195)
+4‚Äã‚à•‚àáfj‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))‚àí‚àáfj‚Äã(Œ∏^j‚Äã(w))‚à•24superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptùëìùëósubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§‚àásubscriptùëìùëósubscript^ùúÉùëóùë§2\displaystyle+4\Big{\lVert}\nabla f_{j}(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))-\nabla f_{j}(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))\Big{\rVert}^{2} (196)
+8‚Äã‚à•‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏^j‚Äã(w))‚àí‚àáf‚Äã(Œ∏^j‚Äã(w))‚à•28superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëóùë§‚àáùëìsubscript^ùúÉùëóùë§2\displaystyle+8\Big{\lVert}\nabla f_{i}(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))-\nabla f(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))\Big{\rVert}^{2} (197)
+8‚Äã‚à•‚àáf‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))‚àí‚àáfj‚Äã(Œ∏^i‚Äã(w))‚à•28superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àáùëìsubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§‚àásubscriptùëìùëósubscript^ùúÉùëñùë§2\displaystyle+8\Big{\lVert}\nabla f(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))-\nabla f_{j}(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w))\Big{\rVert}^{2} (198)

Note that we can bound (197) and (198) according to Lemma 16:

1n‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚à•‚àáfi‚Äã(Œ∏^j‚Äã(w))‚àí‚àáf‚Äã(Œ∏^j‚Äã(w))‚à•21ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptùëìùëñsubscript^ùúÉùëóùë§‚àáùëìsubscript^ùúÉùëóùë§2\displaystyle\frac{1}{n}\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\Big{\lVert}\nabla f_{i}(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))-\nabla f(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))\Big{\rVert}^{2} ‚â§(‚Äã16‚Äã)‚ÄãŒ≥g2,italic-(16italic-)superscriptsubscriptùõæùëî2\displaystyle\overset{\eqref{eq:bounded-heterogeneity}}{\leq}\gamma_{g}^{2}, (199)

and also given the fact that function f‚Äã(‚ãÖ)ùëì‚ãÖf(\cdot) as well as each function fi‚Äã(‚ãÖ)subscriptùëìùëñ‚ãÖf_{i}(\cdot) are LùêøL-smooth, we can bound (194), (195), and (196) as follows:

‚à•‚àáfi(Œ∏^i(w))\displaystyle\Big{\lVert}\nabla f_{i}(\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)) ‚àí‚àáfi(Œ∏^j(w))‚à•2\displaystyle-\nabla f_{i}(\hat{\theta}_{j}(w))\Big{\rVert}^{2} (200)
‚â§L2‚Äã‚à•Œ∏^i‚Äã(w)‚àíŒ∏^j‚Äã(w)‚à•2absentsuperscriptùêø2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•subscript^ùúÉùëñùë§subscript^ùúÉùëóùë§2\displaystyle\leq L^{2}\Big{\lVert}\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)-\hat{\theta}_{j}(w)\Big{\rVert}^{2} (201)
=L2Œª2‚Äã‚à•Œª‚Äã[Œ∏^i‚Äã(w)‚àíw]‚àíŒª‚Äã[Œ∏^j‚Äã(w)‚àíw]‚à•2absentsuperscriptùêø2superscriptùúÜ2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•ùúÜdelimited-[]subscript^ùúÉùëñùë§ùë§ùúÜdelimited-[]subscript^ùúÉùëóùë§ùë§2\displaystyle=\frac{L^{2}}{\lambda^{2}}\Big{\lVert}\lambda\left[\hat{\theta}_{i}(w)-w\right]-\lambda\left[\hat{\theta}_{j}(w)-w\right]\Big{\rVert}^{2} (202)
=L2Œª2‚Äã‚à•‚àáFi(c)‚Äã(w)‚àí‚àáFj(c)‚Äã(w)‚à•2absentsuperscriptùêø2superscriptùúÜ2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëêùëñùë§‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëêùëóùë§2\displaystyle{=}\frac{L^{2}}{\lambda^{2}}\Big{\lVert}\nabla F^{(c)}_{i}(w)-\nabla F^{(c)}_{j}(w)\Big{\rVert}^{2} (203)
=L2Œª2‚Äã‚à•‚àáFi(c)‚Äã(w)‚àí‚àáF(c)‚Äã(w)+‚àáF(c)‚Äã(w)‚àí‚àáFj(c)‚Äã(w)‚à•2absentsuperscriptùêø2superscriptùúÜ2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëêùëñùë§‚àásuperscriptùêπùëêùë§‚àásuperscriptùêπùëêùë§‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëêùëóùë§2\displaystyle{=}\frac{L^{2}}{\lambda^{2}}\Big{\lVert}\nabla F^{(c)}_{i}(w)-\nabla F^{(c)}(w)+\nabla F^{(c)}(w)-\nabla F^{(c)}_{j}(w)\Big{\rVert}^{2} (204)
‚â§2‚ÄãL2Œª2‚Äã[‚à•‚àáFi(c)‚Äã(w)‚àí‚àáF(c)‚Äã(w)‚à•2+‚à•‚àáF(c)‚Äã(w)‚àí‚àáFj(c)‚Äã(w)‚à•2].absent2superscriptùêø2superscriptùúÜ2delimited-[]superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëêùëñùë§‚àásuperscriptùêπùëêùë§2superscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásuperscriptùêπùëêùë§‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëêùëóùë§2\displaystyle{\leq}\frac{2L^{2}}{\lambda^{2}}\left[\Big{\lVert}\nabla F^{(c)}_{i}(w)-\nabla F^{(c)}(w)\Big{\rVert}^{2}+\Big{\lVert}\nabla F^{(c)}(w)-\nabla F^{(c)}_{j}(w)\Big{\rVert}^{2}\right]. (205)

Therefore, according to (206)-(205), we have

1n‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚à•‚àáFi(c)‚Äã(w)‚àí‚àáF(c)‚Äã(w)‚à•21ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëêùëñùë§‚àásuperscriptùêπùëêùë§2\displaystyle\frac{1}{n}\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\Big{\lVert}\nabla F^{(c)}_{i}(w)-\nabla F^{(c)}(w)\Big{\rVert}^{2} ‚â§16Œ≥g2+48‚ÄãL2n‚ÄãŒª2‚àëi=1n‚à•‚àáFi(c)(w)‚àí‚àá\displaystyle\leq 16\gamma_{g}^{2}+\frac{48L^{2}}{n\lambda^{2}}\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\Big{\lVert}\nabla F^{(c)}_{i}(w)-\nabla F(c)(w)‚à•2‚áí\displaystyle F^{(c)}(w)\Big{\rVert}^{2}\Rightarrow (206)
1n‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚à•‚àáFi(c)‚Äã(w)‚àí‚àáF(c)‚Äã(w)‚à•21ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëêùëñùë§‚àásuperscriptùêπùëêùë§2\displaystyle\frac{1}{n}\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\Big{\lVert}\nabla F^{(c)}_{i}(w)-\nabla F^{(c)}(w)\Big{\rVert}^{2} ‚â§16‚ÄãŒª2‚ÄãŒ≥g2Œª2‚àí48‚ÄãL2,absent16superscriptùúÜ2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëî2superscriptùúÜ248superscriptùêø2\displaystyle\leq\frac{16\lambda^{2}\gamma_{g}^{2}}{\lambda^{2}-48L^{2}}, (207)

which concludes the proof. ‚àé

Now, we are ready to state the proof of Theorem 3.

Proof of Theorem 3.

We write ‚àá~‚ÄãFi(c)‚Äã(w)=‚àáF~i(c)‚Äã(w,ùíüi)~‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëêùëñùë§‚àásubscriptsuperscript~ùêπùëêùëñùë§subscriptùíüùëñ\tilde{\nabla}F^{(c)}_{i}\left(w\right)=\nabla\tilde{F}^{(c)}_{i}\left(w,\mathcal{D}_{i}\right) to simplify (10). Then, the update rule for Algorithms 1 & 2 under Option C can be written as follows:

wt+1=wt‚àíŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚Äã‚àëq=0Q‚àí1‚àá~‚ÄãFit(c)‚Äã(wit,qŒ©‚Äã(t)),superscriptùë§ùë°1superscriptùë§ùë°ùúÇùõΩsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1~‚àásubscriptsuperscriptùêπùëêsubscriptùëñùë°superscriptsubscriptùë§subscriptùëñùë°ùëûŒ©ùë°\displaystyle w^{t{+}1}=w^{t}-\eta\beta\sum\limits_{q=0}^{Q{-}1}\tilde{\nabla}F^{(c)}_{i_{t}}\left(w_{i_{t},q}^{\Omega(t)}\right), (208)

where similar to (B)-(139), we can show that:

ùîº‚ÄãF(c)‚Äã(wt+1)ùîºsuperscriptùêπùëêsuperscriptùë§ùë°1\displaystyle\mathbb{E}F^{(c)}\left(w^{t{+}1}\right) ‚â§ùîº‚ÄãF(c)‚Äã(wt)‚àí[Œ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚Äã(2‚ÄãQ‚àí1)2‚àí2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãLc‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãQ2]‚Äãùîº‚Äã‚à•‚àáF(c)‚Äã(wt)‚à•2absentùîºsuperscriptùêπùëêsuperscriptùë§ùë°delimited-[]ùúÇùõΩ2ùëÑ122superscriptùúÇ2subscriptùêøùëêsuperscriptùõΩ2superscriptùëÑ2ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•‚àásuperscriptùêπùëêsuperscriptùë§ùë°2\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}F^{(c)}(w^{t})-\left[\frac{\eta\beta(2Q{-}1)}{2}-2\eta^{2}L_{c}\beta^{2}Q^{2}\right]\mathbb{E}\left\lVert\nabla F^{(c)}(w^{t})\right\rVert^{2} (209)
+Œ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãQ‚ÄãLc2‚Äã(1+2‚ÄãŒ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãLc)n‚Äã‚àëi=1n‚àëq=0Q‚àí1ùîº‚Äã‚à•wi,qŒ©‚Äã(t)‚àíwt‚à•2‚èü=‚Å£:Sc1ùúÇùõΩùëÑsuperscriptsubscriptùêøùëê212ùúÇùõΩsubscriptùêøùëêùëõsubscript‚èüsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùëû0ùëÑ1ùîºsuperscriptdelimited-‚à•‚à•superscriptsubscriptùë§ùëñùëûŒ©ùë°superscriptùë§ùë°2:absentsubscriptùëÜsubscriptùëê1\displaystyle+\frac{\eta\beta QL_{c}^{2}\left(1{+}2\eta\beta L_{c}\right)}{n}\underbrace{\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}\sum\limits_{q{=}0}^{Q{-}1}\mathbb{E}\left\lVert w_{i,q}^{\Omega(t)}-w^{t}\right\rVert^{2}}_{=:S_{c_{1}}} (210)
+Œ∑‚ÄãŒ≤‚ÄãQ2‚ÄãŒºc2+2‚ÄãŒ∑2‚ÄãLc‚ÄãŒ≤2‚ÄãQ2‚Äã(œÉc2+Œ≥c2),ùúÇùõΩsuperscriptùëÑ2superscriptsubscriptùúáùëê22superscriptùúÇ2subscriptùêøùëêsuperscriptùõΩ2superscriptùëÑ2superscriptsubscriptùúéùëê2superscriptsubscriptùõæùëê2\displaystyle+\eta\beta Q^{2}\mu_{c}^{2}+2\eta^{2}L_{c}\beta^{2}Q^{2}\left(\sigma_{c}^{2}+\gamma_{c}^{2}\right), (211)

with Lc,Œºc,œÉc,Œ≥csubscriptùêøùëêsubscriptùúáùëêsubscriptùúéùëêsubscriptùõæùëêL_{c},\mu_{c},\sigma_{c},\gamma_{c} as defined in Lemmas 5, 6, and 7. Thus, to show the convergence rate of our method for the cost function in (6), it would only be sufficient to provide an upper bound on Sc1subscriptùëÜsubscriptùëê1S_{c_{1}}. First, note that similar to (65)-(69), we have
